anya-e0104n2:103_8: yonivibhāgato paṭisandhiyaṁ, pavattiyañca rūpadhammānaṁ pavattibhedo vattabbo, so
anya-e0104n2:103_9: parato paṭiccasamuppādakathāyaṁ āvi bhavissatīti na vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n2:106_1: vuccamānaṁ rāsaṭṭhaṁ ulliṅgeti. Vedayitaṁ ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etassāti
anya-e0104n2:106_2: vedayitalakkhaṇaṁ. Sabbaṁ taṁ dhammajātanti adhippāyo, pubbe vā rūpakkhandhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0104n2:106_3: vuttaṁ adhikārato ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ. Ekato katvāti atītādibhedabhinnaṁ sabbaṁ
anya-e0104n2:106_4: taṁ buddhiyā ekato katvā. Evañhi rāsaṭṭhassa sambhavo. Nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n2:106_5: sañjānanaṁ, ‘‘nīlaṁ pītaṁ dīghaṁ rassa’’nti (dha. sa. 615) ca ādinā saññuppādavasena
anya-e0104n2:106_6: jānanaṁ gahaṇaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etassāti sañjānanalakkhaṇaṁ. Abhisaṅkharaṇaṁ āyūhanaṁ byāpārāpatti,
anya-e0104n2:106_7: abhisandahanaṁ vā, ubhayathāpi cetanāpadhānatāya saṅkhārakkhandhassa evaṁ vuttaṁ
anya-e0104n2:106_10: nāḷiyā minamāno puriso viya yena sañjānanākāravisiṭṭhena ākārena visayaṁ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0104n2:106_11: taṁ ārammaṇūpaladdhisaṅkhātaṁ vijānanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etassāti vijānanalakkhaṇaṁ. Itare
anya-e0104n2:106_12: vedanākkhandhādayo suviññeyyā hontīti viññāṇena ekuppādādibhāvato, samānajātiādivibhāgato ca.
anya-e0104n2:107_1: vuttaṁ. Yathāpaccayaṁ pavattimattametaṁ, yadidaṁ sabhāvadhammoti dassetuṁ ‘‘vijānanalakkhaṇa’’nti
anya-e0104n2:107_2: bhāvasādhanavasena vuttaṁ. Dhammasabhāvā vinimutto koci kattā nāma natthīti tasseva
anya-e0104n2:107_3: kattubhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘vijānātī’’ti vuttaṁ. Yaṁ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṁ, tadeva cintanādiatthena
anya-e0104n2:107_4: cittaṁ, mananaṭṭhena manoti pariyāyatopi naṁ bodheti. Ettāvatā ca khandhato, bhedato,
anya-e0104n2:108_0: Jāyanti ettha visadisāpi sadisākārāti jāti, samānākāro. Sā panāyaṁ jāti kāmaṁ anekavidhā
anya-e0104n2:108_1: nānappakārā, taṁ idhādhippetameva pana dassento ‘‘kusalaṁ, akusalaṁ, abyākatañcā’’ti
anya-e0104n2:108_2: āha. Tattha kusalaṭṭhena kusalaṁ. Koyaṁ kusalaṭṭho nāma? Ārogyaṭṭho anavajjaṭṭho
anya-e0104n2:108_3: sukhavipākaṭṭho. Ārogyaṭṭhenāpi hi kusalaṁ vuccati ‘‘kacci nu bhoto kusala’’ntiādīsu
anya-e0104n2:108_5: Yo kho, mahārāja , anavajjo kāyasamācāro’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.361). Sukhavipākaṭṭhenāpi
anya-e0104n2:109_0: Saddatthato pana kucchite pāpadhamme salayati calayati kammeti viddhaṁsetīti kusalaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:109_1: Kucchitena vā ākārena sayantīti kusā, pāpadhammā, te kuse lunāti chindatīti kusalaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:109_2: Kucchitānaṁ vā sānato tanukaraṇato ñāṇaṁ kusaṁ nāma, tena lātabbaṁ gahetabbaṁ pavattetabbanti
anya-e0104n2:109_3: kusalaṁ. Yathā vā kuso ubhayabhāgagataṁ hatthapadesaṁ lunāti, evamidaṁ uppannānuppannavasena
anya-e0104n2:109_4: ubhayabhāgagataṁ saṁkilesapakkhaṁ lunāti chindati, tasmā kuso viya lunātīti kusalaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:109_5: Kucchitānaṁ vā sāvajjadhammānaṁ salanato saṁvaraṇato kusalaṁ. Kusaladhammavasena
anya-e0104n2:109_6: hi akusalā pavattinivāraṇena, appavattibhāvāpādanena ca manacchaṭṭhesu dvāresu appavattiyā
anya-e0104n2:109_7: saṁvutā pihitā honti. Kucchite vā pāpadhamme salayati kampeti apanetīti kusalaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:109_8: Kucchitānaṁ vā pāṇātipātādīnaṁ pāpadhammānaṁ sānato nisānato tejanato kusā, dosalobhādayo.
anya-e0104n2:109_9: Dosādīnañhi vasena cetanāya tikkhabhāvappattiyā pāṇātipātādīnaṁ mahāsāvajjatā, te
anya-e0104n2:109_10: kuse lunāti chindatīti kusalaṁ. Kucchitānaṁ vā sānato antakaraṇato vināsanato kusāni,
anya-e0104n2:109_11: puññakiriyavasena pavattāni saddhādīni indriyāni, tehi lātabbaṁ pavattetabbanti kusalaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:109_12: ‘‘Ku’’ iti vā bhūmi vuccati, adhiṭṭhānabhāvena taṁsadisassa attano nissayabhūtassa
anya-e0104n2:109_13: rūpārūpappabandhassa sampati, āyatiñca anudahanena vināsanato kuṁ siyantīti kusā,
anya-e0104n2:109_14: rāgādayo, te viya attano nissayassa lavanato chindanato kusalaṁ. Payogasampāditā
anya-e0104n2:109_15: hi kusaladhammā accantameva rūpārūpadhamme appavattikaraṇena samucchindantīti.
anya-e0104n2:110_0: Na kusalanti akusalaṁ, kusalapaṭipakkhanti attho. Na kusalanti hi kusalapaṭikkhepena
anya-e0104n2:110_1: akusalapadassa avayavabhedena atthe vuccamāne yathā yaṁ dhammajātaṁ na arogaṁ, na
anya-e0104n2:110_2: anavajjaṁ, na sukhavipākaṁ, na ca kosallasambhūtaṁ, taṁ akusalanti ayamattho dassito
anya-e0104n2:110_3: hoti, evaṁ yaṁ na kucchitānaṁ salanasabhāvaṁ, na kusānaṁ lavanasabhāvaṁ, na kusena
anya-e0104n2:110_4: kusehi vā pavattetabbaṁ, na ca kuso viya lavanakaṁ, taṁ akusalaṁ nāmāti ayampi attho
anya-e0104n2:110_5: dassito hoti. Ettha ca yasmā kusalaṁ akusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṁ, yato cetasikarogapaṭipakkhādibhāvato
anya-e0104n2:110_6: arogādipariyāyenapi bodhitaṁ, tasmā akusalaṁ pana kusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtanti
anya-e0104n2:110_7: vuttaṁ ‘‘kusalapaṭipakkhanti attho’’ti. Taṁ pana yathākkamaṁ pahāyakapahātabbabhāvenevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:111_0: Na byākatanti abyākataṁ, kusalākusalabhāvena akathitanti attho. Tattha kusalabhāvo
anya-e0104n2:111_2: vuttaṁ hoti. Eteneva arogasarogādibhāvena ca avuttatā vaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbā. Ettha
anya-e0104n2:111_3: ca ‘‘kusalaṁ akusala’’nti ca vatvā ‘‘abyākata’’nti vuttattā kusalākusalabhāveneva
anya-e0104n2:111_4: avuttatā viññāyati, na pakārantarena. Avuttatā cettha na tathā avattabbatāmattena,
anya-e0104n2:111_5: atha kho tadubhayavinimuttasabhāvatāya tesaṁ dhammānanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tathā hetaṁ
anya-e0104n2:112_0: 452.Bhūmibhedatoti bhavanti ettha dhammāti bhūmi, ṭhānaṁ, avatthā ca. Avatthāpi hi
anya-e0104n2:112_1: avatthāvantānaṁ pavattiṭṭhānaṁ viya gayhati, evaṁ nesaṁ sukhaggahaṇaṁ hotīti . Tattha
anya-e0104n2:112_2: lokiyā bhūmi ṭhānavaseneva veditabbā, lokuttarā avatthāvasena. Lokiyā vā ṭhānāvatthāvasena,
anya-e0104n2:112_3: lokuttarā avatthāvaseneva. Kāmāvacaranti ettha vatthukāmo kilesakāmoti dve kāmā.
anya-e0104n2:112_4: Tesu vatthukāmo visesato pañca kāmaguṇā kāmīyantīti, kilesakāmo taṇhā kāmetīti. Te
anya-e0104n2:112_5: dvepi sahitā hutvā yattha avacaranti, taṁ kāmāvacaraṁ. Kiṁ pana tanti? Ekādasavidho
anya-e0104n2:112_6: kāmabhavo. Idaṁ yebhuyyena tattha avacarati pavattatīti kāmāvacaraṁ ekassa avacarasaddassa
anya-e0104n2:112_7: lopaṁ katvā. Evaṁ rūpārūpāvacarānipi veditabbāni rūpataṇhā rūpaṁ, arūpataṇhā arūpanti
anya-e0104n2:112_8: katvā. Atha vā kāmataṇhā kāmo uttarapadalopena, avacarati etthāti avacaraṁ, kāmassa
anya-e0104n2:112_9: avacaraṁ kāmāvacaraṁ. Evaṁ rūpāvacarārūpāvacarānipi veditabbāni. Lokato uttaratīti
anya-e0104n2:112_10: lokuttaraṁ kusalassa adhippetattā. Itaraṁ pana lokato uttiṇṇanti lokuttaraṁ.
anya-e0104n2:113_0: Somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedatoti ettha somanassupekkhābhedo tāva yutto tesaṁ
anya-e0104n2:113_1: bhinnasabhāvattā, ñāṇasaṅkhārabhedo pana kathanti? Nāyaṁ doso ñāṇasaṅkhārakato bhedoñāṇasaṅkhārabhedo,
anya-e0104n2:113_2: so ca tesaṁ bhāvābhāvakatoti katvā. Sobhanaṁ mano, sundaraṁ vā mano etassāti sumano,
anya-e0104n2:113_3: sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṁ, mānasikasukhā vedanā ruḷhiyā, somanassena uppādato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0104n2:113_4: yāva bhaṅgā sahagataṁ pavattaṁ saṁsaṭṭhaṁ, sampayuttanti attho. Somanassasahagatatā
anya-e0104n2:113_5: cassa ārammaṇavasena veditabbā. Iṭṭhārammaṇe hi cittaṁ somanassasahagataṁ hoti. Nanu
anya-e0104n2:113_6: ca iṭṭhārammaṇaṁ lobhassa vatthu, kathaṁ tattha kusalaṁ hotīti? Nayidamekantikaṁ
anya-e0104n2:113_7: iṭṭhepi ābhogādivasena kusalassa uppajjanato. Yassa hi catusampatticakkasamāyogādivasena
anya-e0104n2:113_8: yonisova ābhogo hoti, kusalameva ca mayā kattabbanti kusalakaraṇe cittaṁ niyamitaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:113_9: akusalappavattito ca nivattetvā kusalakaraṇe eva pariṇāmitaṁ, abhiṇhakaraṇavasena
anya-e0104n2:113_10: ca samudācaritaṁ, tassa iṭṭhepi ārammaṇe alobhādisampayuttameva cittaṁ hoti, na lobhādisampayuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:114_0: Ñāṇena samaṁ pakārehi yuttanti ñāṇasampayuttaṁ. Ekuppādādayo eva cettha pakārāti
anya-e0104n2:114_2: Yo hi paresaṁ dhammaṁ deseti, anavajjāni sippāyatanakammāyatanavijjaṭṭhānāni sikkhāpetīti
anya-e0104n2:114_3: evamādikaṁ paññāsaṁvattaniyaṁ karoti, tassa kammūpanissayavasena kusalacittaṁ uppajjamānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:114_4: ñāṇasampayuttaṁ hoti. Tathā abyāpajje loke uppannassa upapattiṁ nissāya ñāṇasampayuttaṁ
anya-e0104n2:114_5: hoti. Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘tassa tattha sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, dandho, bhikkhave,
anya-e0104n2:114_6: satuppādo, atha kho so satto khippaṁyeva visesabhāgī (a. ni. 4.191) hotī’’ti. Tathā
anya-e0104n2:114_7: paññādasakapattassa indriyaparipākaṁ nissāya kusalaṁ uppajjamānaṁ ñāṇasampayuttaṁ
anya-e0104n2:114_8: hoti. Yena pana kilesā vikkhambhitā, tassa kilesadūrībhāvaṁ nissāya ñāṇasampayuttaṁ
anya-e0104n2:114_9: hoti. Vuttampi cetaṁ ‘‘yogā ve jāyate bhūri, ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo’’ti (dha. pa. 282).
anya-e0104n2:114_10: Attano vā parassa vā samussāhajanitaṁ cittapayogasaṅkhātaṁ saṅkharaṇaṁ saṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n2:114_11: so etassa natthīti asaṅkhāraṁ. Tena pana saha saṅkhārena pavattatīti sasaṅkhāraṁ.
anya-e0104n2:114_12: Ñāṇena vippayuttaṁ virahitanti ñāṇavippayuttaṁ. Vippayogoti cettha ñāṇassa abhāvo
anya-e0104n2:114_13: appavattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Upekkhatīti upekkhā, vedayamānāpi ārammaṇaṁ ajjhupekkhati
anya-e0104n2:114_14: majjhattatākārasaṇṭhitattāti attho. Atha vā upetā sukhadukkhānaṁ aviruddhā ikkhā
anya-e0104n2:114_15: anubhavananti upekkhā. Atha vā iṭṭhe ca aniṭṭhe ca ārammaṇe pakkhapātābhāvena upapattito
anya-e0104n2:114_16: yuttito ikkhati anubhavatīti upekkhā, tāya sahagatanti upekkhāsahagataṁ. Sesaṁ sabbaṁ
anya-e0104n2:115_0: Evaṁ aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacittāni uddisitvā idāni tesaṁ pavattiākāraṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘yadā
anya-e0104n2:115_1: hī’’tiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha paṭiggāhakādisampattinti ettha ādi-saddena desakālakalyāṇamittādisampattiṁ
anya-e0104n2:115_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Aññaṁ vā somanassahetunti ettha aññaggahaṇena saddhābahulatā, visuddhadiṭṭhitā,
anya-e0104n2:115_4: dhammāti evamādīnaṁ saṅgaho. Ādinayappavattanti ettha ādi-saddena na kevalaṁ ‘‘atthi
anya-e0104n2:115_6: atha kho dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyādīnampi saṅgaho veditabbo. Purakkhatvāti
anya-e0104n2:115_7: pubbaṅgamaṁ katvā. Tañca kho sahajātapubbaṅgamavasena ‘‘manopubbaṅgamā dhammā’’tiādīsu
anya-e0104n2:115_8: (dha. pa. 1-2) viya sampayogassa adhippetattā. Asaṁsīdantoti silokamacchariyādivasena
anya-e0104n2:115_9: puññakiriyāyaṁ saṁsīdaṁ saṅkocaṁ anāpajjanto, tena muttacāgatādiṁ dasseti. Anussāhitoti
anya-e0104n2:115_10: kenacipi na ussāhito. Sarasato hi puññapaṭipattidassanamidaṁ. Parehīti pana pākaṭussāhanadassanaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:116_0: Dānādīnīti dānaṁ sīlaṁ yāva diṭṭhijukammanti imāni dānādīni dasa puññāni, dānādīnīti
anya-e0104n2:116_1: vā dānasīlabhāvanāmayāni itaresampi sattannaṁ etthevantogadhattā. Yattha sayaṁ uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n2:116_2: taṁ santānaṁ punanti, pujjaṁ bhavaphalaṁ nibbattentīti vā puññāni. Assa puññacetanāsamaṅgino.
anya-e0104n2:116_3: Amuttacāgatā deyyadhamme sāpekkhacittatā. Ādi-saddena sīlasamādānādīsu anadhimuttatādiṁ
anya-e0104n2:116_4: saṅgaṇhāti. Tadevāti somanassasahagatādinā sadisatāya vuttaṁ. Sadisampi hi ‘‘tadevā’’ti
anya-e0104n2:116_5: voharīyati yathā ‘‘sā eva tittirī, tāniyeva osadhānī’’ti. Imasmiñhi attheti līnassa
anya-e0104n2:116_6: cittassa ussāhanapayogasaṅkhāte atthe. Etanti ‘‘saṅkhāro’’ti etaṁ padaṁ. Pubbapayogassāti
anya-e0104n2:116_7: puññakiriyāyaṁ saṅkoce jāyamāne tato vivecetvā samussāhanavasena pavattassa cittapayogassa,
anya-e0104n2:116_8: pubbaggahaṇañcettha tathāpavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena so saṅkhāro hotīti katvā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:116_9: na tassa saṅkhārassa pubbakālikattā. ‘‘Atthi dinna’’ntiādi (ma. ni. 1.441; 2.95)
anya-e0104n2:116_11: sahasā-gahaṇaṁ. Somanassarahitā honti puññaṁ karontāti adhippāyo. Somanassahetūnaṁ
anya-e0104n2:117_0: Evantiādi nigamanaṁ. Tayidaṁ aṭṭhavidhampi kāmāvacaraṁ kusalacittaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0104n2:117_1: yāva dhammārammaṇanti chasu ārammaṇesu yaṁ vā taṁ vā ālambitvā upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātānantaraṁ
anya-e0104n2:117_2: kāyadvārādīhi tīhi dvārehi kāyakammādivasena uppajjatīti veditabbaṁ. Tattha ñāṇasampayuttāni
anya-e0104n2:117_3: cattāri yadā tihetukapaṭisandhiṁ uppādenti, tadā soḷasa vipākacittāni phalanti. Yadā
anya-e0104n2:117_4: pana duhetukaṁ, tadā dvādasa tihetukavajjāni. Ahetukaṁ pana paṭisandhiṁ tihetukāni
anya-e0104n2:117_5: na uppādenteva, duhetukāni pana duhetukapaṭisandhidānakāle dvādasa, ahetukapaṭisandhiṁ
anya-e0104n2:117_6: dānakāle aṭṭha phalanti. Tihetukā pana paṭisandhi duhetukehi na hotiyeva. ‘‘Aṭṭha
anya-e0104n2:117_7: phalantī’’ti cetaṁ paṭisandhiṁ janakakammavasena vuttaṁ. Aññena pana kammunā ‘‘sahetukaṁ
anya-e0104n2:117_9: vacanato sahetukampi vipākacittaṁ ahetukapaṭisandhikassa hotiyeva. Imasmiṁ ca pakkhe
anya-e0104n2:117_10: balavatā paccayena uppannaṁ asaṅkhāraṁ, dubbalena sasaṅkhāranti veditabbaṁ. Ye pana
anya-e0104n2:117_11: āgamanato ca vipākassa asaṅkhārasasaṅkhārabhāvaṁ icchanti, tesaṁ matena dvādasa,
anya-e0104n2:117_12: aṭṭha ca phalantīti yojetabbaṁ. Evaṁ tidhā phalaṁ dadantañcetaṁ kāmāvacarasugatiyaṁ
anya-e0104n2:117_13: upapattiṁ, sugatiduggatīsu bhogasampadañca karoti. Nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi hi yaṁ devabhogasampattisadisaṁ
anya-e0104n2:117_14: bhogajātaṁ uppajjati, tampi kāmāvacarakusalasseva phalaṁ. Na hi akusalassa iṭṭhaṁ phalaṁ atthīti.
anya-e0104n2:118_0: Rūpāvacaraṁ panāti pana-saddo visesatthajotako. Tena yathā kāmāvacaraṁ kilesānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:118_1: tadaṅgappahānamattakaraṁ, na evamidaṁ, idaṁ pana vikkhambhanappahānakaraṁ. Yathā
anya-e0104n2:118_2: vā taṁ vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhadhā bhijjati, na evamidaṁ, idaṁ pana tato aññathā
anya-e0104n2:118_3: vāti vakkhamānaṁ visesaṁ joteti. Taṁ panetaṁ savatthukaṁ, sāsavaṁ, vinīvaraṇañca
anya-e0104n2:118_4: rūpāvacaranti daṭṭhabbaṁ. ‘‘Savatthukaṁ evā’’ti hi iminā arūpāvacaraṁ nivatteti,
anya-e0104n2:118_6: Katthaci pañca jhānaṅgāni, katthaci cattāri, katthaci tīṇi, katthaci dve, katthaci
anya-e0104n2:118_7: aparāni dveti evaṁ jhānaṅgayogabhedato pañcavidhanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ vivarituṁ
anya-e0104n2:118_8: ‘‘seyyathida’’ntiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ heṭṭhā jhānakathāyaṁ (visuddhi.
anya-e0104n2:118_9: 1.79 ādayo) vuttameva. Tayidaṁ bhāvanāmayameva hutvā vuttanayena pathavīkasiṇādikaṁ
anya-e0104n2:118_10: ālambitvā yathārahaṁ ñāṇasampayuttakusalānantaraṁ uppajjati, hīnādibhedabhinnaṁ panetaṁ
anya-e0104n2:118_11: yathākkamaṁ brahmapārisajjādīsu soḷasasupi brahmalokesu upapattinipphādakanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:119_0: Rūpasaññāsamatikkamādinā samadhigantabbaṁ arūpāvacaraṁ. Catunnaṁ arūpānanti upekkhāsamādhisaṅkhātehi
anya-e0104n2:119_1: catūhi arūpajjhānehi. Karaṇe hi etaṁ sāmivacanaṁ. Arūpānaṁ vā yo ārammaṇādikato sampayuttadhammehi
anya-e0104n2:119_2: yogo yogabhedo, tassa vasena. Vuttappakārenāti heṭṭhā āruppakathāyaṁ (visuddhi. 1.275
anya-e0104n2:119_3: ādayo) vuttappakārena. Paṭhamanti paṭhamaṁ arūpāvacarakusalacittaṁ. Dutiyatatiyacatutthānīti
anya-e0104n2:119_4: etthāpi eseva nayo. Tānimāni bhāvanāmayāneva hutvā yathānupubbaṁ kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:119_6: uppajjitvā catūsu arūpībrahmalokesu paṭisandhipavattivipākadāyīni. Sesaṁ panettha
anya-e0104n2:119_7: yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Chavisuddhiparamparāya samadhigantabbaṁ lokuttaraṁ.
anya-e0104n2:119_8: Tattha vattabbaṁ parato āgamissati. Catumaggasampayogatoti sotāpattimaggo yāva arahattamaggoti
anya-e0104n2:119_9: imehi catūhi ariyamaggehi sampayogato. Catubbidhampi cetaṁ bhāvanāmayameva hutvā
anya-e0104n2:119_10: nibbānaṁ ālambitvā suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkhoti nāmena
anya-e0104n2:120_0: 453.Kāmāvacaramevāti ettha nikāyantariyā rūpārūpāvacarampi akusalaṁ icchantīti tesaṁ
anya-e0104n2:120_1: matinisedhanatthaṁ kāmāvacaraggahaṇaṁ. Mahaggatabhūmiyaṁ uppajjantampi tattha rūpadhātuyaṁ
anya-e0104n2:120_2: pavattivipākaṁ dentampi ekantena kāmāvacaramevāti dassanatthaṁ avadhāraṇaṁ. Yadi
anya-e0104n2:120_3: evaṁ, kasmā kāmāvacaramevāti? Tattha kāraṇaṁ vuttameva. Kathaṁ vuttaṁ? ‘‘Kāmataṇhā
anya-e0104n2:120_4: kāmo uttarapadalopato, avacarati etthāti avacaraṁ, kāmassa avacaraṁ kāmāvacara’’nti.
anya-e0104n2:120_5: Ettha hi kāmataṇhāvisayatā ‘‘kāmāvacarabhāvassa kāraṇaṁ’’ vuttā yathā rūpārūpataṇhāvisayatā
anya-e0104n2:120_6: ‘‘rūpārūpāvacarabhāvassa’’. Ekaṁsena cetaṁ evaṁ icchitabbaṁ. Aññathā byāpilakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0104n2:120_7: na siyā. Yadi hi ālambitabbadhammavasena bhūmivavatthānaṁ kareyya, evaṁ sati anārammaṇānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:120_8: saṅgaho na siyā. Atha vipākadānavasena, evampi avipākānaṁ saṅgaho na siyā. Tasmā
anya-e0104n2:120_9: ālambaṇadhammavasena pariyāpannānaṁ sā kātabbā, apariyāpannānaṁ pana lokato uttiṇṇatāya
anya-e0104n2:121_0: Pariyāpannāti ca paricchedakārikāya taṇhāya paricchijja āpannā, gahitāti attho. Nanu
anya-e0104n2:121_1: cettha kāmataṇhā katamā? Kāmāvacaradhammārammaṇā taṇhā, kāmāvacaradhammā katame?
anya-e0104n2:121_3: kañci taṇhaṁ kāmataṇhābhāvena gahetvā taṁsabhāvāya taṇhāya visayabhāvena kāmāvacaradhammānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:121_5: avīciparanimmitaparicchinnokāsāya kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṁ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:122_0: Mūlato tividhanti tīṇi akusalamūlāni lobhādīni, tesaṁ vasena taṁsahitampi tividhanti
anya-e0104n2:122_1: attho. Tāni hi suppatiṭṭhitabhāvakāraṇattā mūlamivāti mūlāni, lobho mūlaṁ etassāti
anya-e0104n2:122_2: lobhamūlaṁ. Asādhāraṇena niddeso yathā bherisaddo, yavaṅkuroti. Tathā dosamūlaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:122_3: Moho eva mūlaṁ imassa, nāññanti mohamūlaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:123_1: saṅkhārabhedatoti paccekaṁ bhedasaddo yojetabbo. Yadettha vattabbaṁ, taṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
anya-e0104n2:123_3: ni. 2.119; a. ni. 9.11) yathā. Atha vā vipariyesaggāhatāya diṭṭhiyā gatameva, na
anya-e0104n2:123_4: ettha gantabbavatthu tathā sabhāvanti diṭṭhigataṁ. Tayidaṁ ‘‘idameva saccaṁ, moghamañña’’nti
anya-e0104n2:123_5: (ma. ni. 2.187, 202, 203, 427; 3.27-29) abhinivesabhāvato lobheneva saddhiṁ pavattati, na dosena.
anya-e0104n2:124_1: Tāya hi vipallatthacittā sattā ‘‘etāvako jīvavisayo yāva indriyagocaro’’ti paralokaṁ
anya-e0104n2:124_2: paṭikkhipitvā ‘‘natthi kāmesu ādīnavo’’ti yathā tathā kāmesu pātabyataṁ āpajjanti.
anya-e0104n2:124_3: Ādi-saddena ‘‘esa pantho pageva vihito devayāne, yena yanti puttavanto visokā. Taṁ
anya-e0104n2:124_4: passanti pasavo, pakkhino ca, tena te mātaripi mithunaṁ carantī’’tiādinā nayena puttamukhadassanaṁ
anya-e0104n2:125_0: Kāmevāti ettha vā-saddo aniyamattho, tena brāhmaṇānaṁ suvaṇṇaharaṇameva adinnādāne
anya-e0104n2:125_1: sāvajjaṁ, itaraṁ anavajjaṁ. Garūnaṁ, gunnaṁ, attano, jīvitassa, vivāhassa ca atthāya
anya-e0104n2:125_2: musāvādo anavajjo, itaro sāvajjo. Garuādīnaṁ atthāya pesuññaharaṇaṁ anavajjaṁ, itaraṁ
anya-e0104n2:125_3: sāvajjaṁ. Bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādikathā pāpavūpasamāya hotīti evamādike micchāgāhe
anya-e0104n2:125_5: micchābhinivesassa vā vasena saraseneva tikhiṇena kurūrena. Mandenāti dandhena atikhiṇena.
anya-e0104n2:125_6: Tādisaṁ pana attano, parassa vā samussāhanena pavattatīti āha ‘‘samussāhitenā’’ti.
anya-e0104n2:125_7: Parabhaṇḍaṁ vā haratīti vā-saddena tathāpavattanakamusāvādādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n2:125_8: Kāmānaṁ vā anubhuyyamānānaṁ. Vā-saddena parasantakassa vā ayathādhippetatāya yaṁ
anya-e0104n2:126_0: Duvidhameva hoti sampayuttadhammavasena bhedābhāvato. Yadi evaṁ, kasmā ‘‘domanassasahagataṁ
anya-e0104n2:126_1: paṭighasampayutta’’nti vuttanti? Asādhāraṇadhammehi tassa cittassa upalakkhaṇatthaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:126_3: saṅgaṇhāti. Sabhāvatikkhaṁ hutvā pavattamānaṁ cittaṁ asaṅkhārameva hoti, itaraṁ sasaṅkhāranti
anya-e0104n2:126_4: adhippāyenāha ‘‘tikkhamandappavattikāle’’ti. Mandaṁ pana hutvā pavattamānaṁ ekaṁsena
anya-e0104n2:126_5: sasaṅkhāramevāti na sakkā viññātuṁ. Yaṁ sasaṅkhārena sappayogena pavattati, taṁ mandameva
anya-e0104n2:127_0: Mohekahetukaṁ cittaṁ mūlantaravirahato atimūḷhaṁ, vicikicchuddhaccayogato cañcalañcāti
anya-e0104n2:127_1: upekkhāsahagatameva hoti, na tassa kadācipi sabhāvatikkhatā atthi. Ārammaṇe hi saṁsappanavasena,
anya-e0104n2:127_2: vikkhipanavasena ca pavattamānassa cittadvayassa kīdise kicce sabhāvatikkhatāya,
anya-e0104n2:127_3: ussāhetabbatāya vā bhavitabbaṁ, tasmā na tattha saṅkhārabhedo atthi. Aññesu akusalacittesu
anya-e0104n2:127_4: labbhamānampi uddhaccaṁ visesato ettheva balavaṁ, tato eva sampayuttadhammesu padhānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:127_5: hutvā pavattatīti idameva uddhaccena visesetvā vuttaṁ ‘‘uddhaccasampayutta’’nti.
anya-e0104n2:127_6: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṁ (dha. sa. 427) idha sarūpato uddhaccaṁ āgataṁ, evaṁ asādhāraṇapadhānadhammavasena
anya-e0104n2:127_8: Asanniṭṭhānaṁ saṁsayo. Vikkhepo avūpasamo, bhantatāti attho.
anya-e0104n2:128_0: Tayidaṁ dvādasavidhampi akusalacittaṁ chasu ārammaṇesu yaṁ vā taṁ vā ālambitvā upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātānantaraṁ
anya-e0104n2:128_1: kāyadvārādīhi tīhi dvārehi kāyakammādivasena yathārahaṁ pāṇātipātādikammapathavasena
anya-e0104n2:129_0: Tattha ṭhapetvā uddhaccasahagataṁ sesaṁ ekādasavidhampi catūsupi apāyesu paṭisandhiṁ
anya-e0104n2:129_1: deti, pavattivipākaṁ sugatiyampi. Uddhaccasahagataṁ pana pavattivipākamevāti. Etthāha
anya-e0104n2:129_2: – kiṁ pana kāraṇaṁ sabbadubbalaṁ vicikicchāsampayuttaṁ paṭisandhiṁ deti, adhimokkhasabbhāvato
anya-e0104n2:129_3: tato balavantampi uddhaccasahagataṁ na detīti? Dassanena pahātabbesu avuttattā. Idaṁ
anya-e0104n2:129_4: hi paṭisandhiṁ dentaṁ apāyesu dadeyya, apāyagamanīyañca dassanapahātabbanti tattha
anya-e0104n2:129_5: vucceyya, na ca vuttaṁ. Tasmā paṭisandhiṁ na deti, pavattivipākadānaṁ panassa na
anya-e0104n2:129_7: tassa vipāke ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā’’ti (vibha. 730 atthato samānaṁ) vacanato.
anya-e0104n2:130_0: Apare panāhu – puthujjanassa uppajjamānaṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ dassanappahātabbasahāyasabbhāvato
anya-e0104n2:130_1: ubhayavipākampi deti, na sekkhassa tadabhāvatoti. Idamettha vicāretabbaṁ, yassa vipākadānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:130_2: vuttaṁ, kiṁ taṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ, udāhu noti? Kiñcettha – yadi tāva bhāvanāya
anya-e0104n2:130_3: pahātabbaṁ, paṭṭhāne bhāvanāya pahātabbassa nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo vattabbo
anya-e0104n2:130_4: siyā. Atha na bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ, dassanenapahātabbattike ‘‘nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabba’’miccassa
anya-e0104n2:130_5: vibhaṅge vattabbaṁ siyā. Yadi tabbiruddhasabhāvatāya tattha na vucceyya, evampi tasmiṁ
anya-e0104n2:130_6: tike tassa navattabbatā āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, kiṁ kāraṇaṁ? Cittuppādakaṇḍe (dha.
anya-e0104n2:130_7: sa. 365 ādayo) āgatānaṁ dvādasannaṁ akusalacittuppādānaṁ dvīhi padehi saṅgahitattā
anya-e0104n2:130_8: vibhajitvā dassetabbassa niyogato kassaci cittuppādassa abhāvā, yathā uppannattike
anya-e0104n2:130_9: atītādīnaṁ navattabbatā na vuttā, evametassāpi. Atha vā bhāvanāya pahātuṁ asakkuṇeyyassāpi
anya-e0104n2:130_10: tassa puthujjane vattamānassa bhāvanāya pahātabbasabhāvasāmaññato, sāvajjato ca bhāvanāya
anya-e0104n2:130_11: pahātabbapariyāyo vijjatīti natthi navattabbatāpasaṅgadoso. Nippariyāyena ca na bhāvanāya
anya-e0104n2:130_12: pahātabbanti tassa vasena nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvopi na vutto. Dassanapahātabbapaccayassāpi
anya-e0104n2:130_13: uddhaccasahagatassa sahāyavekallamattameva dassanena kataṁ, na kocipi bhāvo anuppādadhammataṁ
anya-e0104n2:130_14: tassa āpāditoti ekantena bhāvanāya pahātabbatā vuttā. Atha vā apāyagamanīyabhāvāpekkhaṁ
anya-e0104n2:131_1: tato eva adhikatābyākatāpekkhāya duvidhanti vuttaṁ. Aññathā rūpanibbānānampi abyākatabhāvato
anya-e0104n2:131_2: taṁ catubbidhanti vattabbaṁ siyā. Vipākassa kāmāvacarādibhāvo kusale vuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n2:131_3: veditabbo. Ahetukatā sahetukatā viya sampayuttahetuvasena, na nibbattakahetuvasena.
anya-e0104n2:131_4: Vipākassa hi sahetukatā sahetukakammavasena sijjhamānāpi sampayuttahetuvaseneva vuccati,
anya-e0104n2:131_5: aññathā ahetukānampi sahetukatā āpajjeyyāti. Kasmā pana sahetukassa ahetuko vipāko
anya-e0104n2:131_6: hotīti? Tattha kāraṇaṁ vuttameva. Kiñca ārammaṇābhinipātamattesu pañcasu viññāṇesu
anya-e0104n2:131_7: yathā alobhādisampayogo na sambhavati, evaṁ mandataramandakiccesu sampaṭicchanasantīraṇesūti
anya-e0104n2:131_8: hetūnaṁ uppattiyā asambhavatopi nesaṁ ahetukatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n2:132: Manoviññāṇato uppajjanavisiṭṭhamananakiccānaṁ abhāvato manomattā dhātu manodhātu.
anya-e0104n2:133_0: Cakkhusannissitaṁ hutvā rūpassa vijānanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etassāti cakkhusannissitarūpavijānanalakkhaṇaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:133_1: Tattha cakkhusannissitavacanena rūpārammaṇaṁ aññaṁ viññāṇaṁ nivatteti. Vijānanaggahaṇena
anya-e0104n2:133_2: cakkhusannissite phassādike nivatteti. Cakkhurūpaggahaṇena nissayato, ārammaṇato
anya-e0104n2:133_3: ca viññāṇaṁ vibhāveti ubhayādhīnavuttikattā. Yadi hi cakkhu nāma na siyā, andhāpi
anya-e0104n2:133_4: rūpaṁ passeyyuṁ, na ca passanti. Yadi ca nīlādirūpaṁ nāma na siyā, desādiniyamena
anya-e0104n2:133_5: na bhavitabbaṁ, attheva ca niyamo, ekantasārammaṇatā ca cittassa vuttāti ‘‘ārammaṇena
anya-e0104n2:133_6: vinā nīlādiābhāsaṁ cittaṁ pavattatī’’ti evaṁ pavatto vādo micchāvādoti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:133_7: Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa’’ntiādi (ma. ni.
anya-e0104n2:134_0: Kasmā panettha vacanabhedo katoti? Ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hoti, rūpaṁ pana
anya-e0104n2:134_1: anekameva saṁhatanti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṁ. Kiṁ pana kāraṇaṁ ekampi cakkhu
anya-e0104n2:134_2: viññāṇassa paccayo hoti, rūpaṁ pana anekamevāti? Paccayabhāvavisesato. Cakkhu hi
anya-e0104n2:134_4: hoti, tasmiṁ sati tassa bhāvato, asati abhāvato. Yato taṁ atthiavigatapaccayehissa
anya-e0104n2:134_5: paccayo hotīti vuccati, taṁnissayatā cassa na ekadesena allīyanavasena icchitabbā
anya-e0104n2:134_6: arūpabhāvato, atha kho garurājādīsu sissarājapurisādīnaṁ viya tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya.
anya-e0104n2:134_7: Itare pana paccayā tena tena visesena veditabbā. Svāyaṁ paccayabhāvo na ekasmiṁ na
anya-e0104n2:134_8: sambhavatīti ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti ‘‘cakkhuñca paṭiccā’’ti ekavacanena niddeso kato.
anya-e0104n2:135_0: Rūpaṁ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātaatthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti puretaraṁ
anya-e0104n2:135_1: hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva upakārakattā, tathāpi anekameva saṁhataṁ hutvā paccayo
anya-e0104n2:135_2: hoti ārammaṇabhāvato. Yañhi paccayadhammaṁ sabhāvabhūtaṁ, parikappitākāramattaṁ vā
anya-e0104n2:135_3: viññāṇaṁ vibhāventaṁ pavattati, tadaññesañca satipi paccayabhāve so tassa sārammaṇasabhāvatāya
anya-e0104n2:135_4: yaṁ kiñci anālambitvā pavattituṁ asamatthassa olubbha pavattikāraṇatāya ālambanīyato
anya-e0104n2:135_5: ārammaṇaṁ nāma. Tassa yasmā yathā tathā sabhāvūpaladdhivasena ārammaṇapaccayalābho,
anya-e0104n2:135_6: tasmā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ rūpaṁ ārabbha pavattamānaṁ tassa sabhāvaṁ vibhāventameva pavattati.
anya-e0104n2:135_7: Sā cassa indriyādhīnavuttikassa ārammaṇasabhāvūpaladdhi, na ekadvikalāpagatavaṇṇavasena
anya-e0104n2:135_8: hoti, nāpi katipayakalāpagatavaṇṇavasena, atha kho ābhogānurūpaṁ āpāthagatavaṇṇavasenāti
anya-e0104n2:135_9: anekameva rūpaṁ saṁhaccakāritāya viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti dassento bhagavā ‘‘rūpe
anya-e0104n2:136_0: Yaṁ pana ‘‘rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena
anya-e0104n2:136_1: paccayo’’ti (paṭṭhā. 1.1.2) vuttaṁ, taṁ kathanti? Tampi yādisaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n2:136_2: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo hoti, tādisameva sandhāya vuttaṁ. Kīdisaṁ pana tanti? Samuditanti
anya-e0104n2:136_3: pākaṭoyamattho. Evañca katvā yadeke vadanti ‘‘āyatanasallakkhaṇavasena cakkhuviññāṇādayo
anya-e0104n2:136_4: sallakkhaṇārammaṇā, na dabbasallakkhaṇavasenā’’ti, tampi yuttameva hoti. Na cettha
anya-e0104n2:136_5: samudāyārammaṇatā āsaṅkitabbā samudāyābhogassevābhāvato. Samuditā pana vaṇṇadhammā
anya-e0104n2:136_6: ārammaṇapaccayā honti. Kathaṁ pana paccekaṁ asamatthā samuditā ārammaṇā paccayā honti,
anya-e0104n2:136_7: na hi paccekaṁ daṭṭhuṁ asakkontā andhā samuditā passantīti? Nayidamekantikaṁ visuṁ
anya-e0104n2:136_8: visuṁ asamatthānaṁ sivikāvahanādīsu samatthatāya dassanato. Kesādīnañca yasmiṁ ṭhāne
anya-e0104n2:136_9: ṭhitānaṁ paccekaṁ vaṇṇaṁ gahetuṁ na sakkā, tasmiṁyeva ṭhāne samuditānaṁ vaṇṇaṁ gahetuṁ
anya-e0104n2:136_10: sakkāti bhiyyopi tesaṁ saṁhaccakāritā paribyattā. Etena cakkhuviññāṇassa paramāṇurūpaṁ
anya-e0104n2:136_11: ārammaṇaṁ, udāhu taṁsamudāyotiādikā codanā paṭikkhittāti veditabbā. ‘‘Sotañca paṭicca
anya-e0104n2:136_12: sadde cā’’tiādīsupi (ma. ni. 1.204, 400; 3.421, 425, 426) eseva nayo. Evaṁ ubhayādhīnavuttikatāya
anya-e0104n2:136_13: cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayato, ārammaṇato ca vibhāvanaṁ kataṁ, evaṁ sotaviññāṇādīsupi
anya-e0104n2:137_1: ārammaṇantaraṁ nivatteti, evaṁ rūpāyatanepi labbhamāne ekacce visese nivatteti. Na
anya-e0104n2:137_2: hi cakkhuviññāṇaṁ vaṇṇamattato aññaṁ kiñci visesaṁ tattha gahetuṁ sakkoti. Tenāha
anya-e0104n2:137_3: bhagavā ‘‘pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṁ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā’’ti.
anya-e0104n2:137_4: Cakkhuviññāṇaṁ uppajjamānaṁ rūpārammaṇe eva uppajjanato tadabhimukhabhāvena gayhatīti
anya-e0104n2:137_7: upakārakā nissayārammaṇadhammā viya āsannakāraṇanti dassento āha ‘‘rūpārammaṇāya
anya-e0104n2:137_8: kiriyamanodhātuyā apagamapadaṭṭhāna’’nti. Sotaviññāṇādīsupi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n2:138_0: Cakkhuviññāṇādigahitaṁ rūpādiārammaṇaṁ tadanantarameva aparipatantaṁ katvā sampaṭicchantī
anya-e0104n2:138_1: gaṇhantī viya hotīti vuttaṁ ‘‘rūpādisampaṭicchanarasā’’ti. Tathābhāvena sampaṭicchanabhāvena
anya-e0104n2:139_0: Chasu ārammaṇesu kadāci pañcannaṁ, tato vā katipayānaṁ vijānanasabhāvāpi chaḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇā
anya-e0104n2:139_1: vuttā taṁsabhāvānativattanato, chasveva vā itaresaṁ ārammaṇānaṁ antogadhattā. Santīraṇādikiccāti
anya-e0104n2:139_3: adhippāyo. ‘‘Hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānā’’ti idaṁ imāsaṁ dvinnaṁ manoviññāṇadhātūnaṁ ekanteneva
anya-e0104n2:139_5: vattuṁ vaṭṭatiyeva. Tassā bhedoti tassā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ‘‘duvidhā’’ti vuttāya
anya-e0104n2:139_6: duvidhatāsaṅkhāto bhedo. Ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇeti ekanteneva iṭṭhe ārammaṇe, ativiya
anya-e0104n2:139_7: iṭṭhārammaṇeti attho. Pañcadvāre ceva javanāvasāne cāti ettha pañcadvāre sampaṭicchanavoṭṭhabbanānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:139_8: antarāḷaṁ ṭhānaṁ, itaratra javanabhavaṅgānanti evaṁ dviṭhānā hoti. Itarāyapi santīraṇatadārammaṇakāle
anya-e0104n2:139_9: yathāvuttameva ṭhānaṁ, paṭisandhiādikāle pana cutibhavaṅgānaṁ antarāḷaṁ paṭisandhiyā,
anya-e0104n2:139_11: antarāḷaṁ bhavaṅgassa, tadārammaṇapaṭisandhīnaṁ javanapaṭisandhīnaṁ vā antarāḷaṁ
anya-e0104n2:140_0: Chasūti ettha pubbe vuttanayeneva vibhāgo veditabbo. Kāyassa nissayabhūtānaṁ nātiiṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbabhūtānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:140_2: ghaṭṭanā dubbalāti cakkhuviññāṇādīni upekkhāsahagatāni. Tenāha ‘‘sesaṁ upekkhāyutta’’nti. Sesaṁ chabbidhampi.
anya-e0104n2:141_0: Alobhādosāmohā ceva alobhādosā ca alobhādayo, tehi alobhādīhi vipākahetūhi sampayuttaṁ
anya-e0104n2:141_3: aṭṭhavidhatāya sadisataṁ dasseti. Kāmāvacarabhāvato hīnādito, yonīsu uppattito ca
anya-e0104n2:141_4: sadisameva, sampayuttadhammato pana ārammaṇato, pavattiākārato ca visadisaṁ. Tathā
anya-e0104n2:141_5: hi kusalaṁ kammadvāravasena pavattati, na idaṁ, vipākānaṁ aviññattijanakattā. Uppattidvāravasena
anya-e0104n2:141_6: pana imassāpi attheva pavattibhedo pañcadvāramanodvāresu mahāvipākānaṁ tadārammaṇavasena
anya-e0104n2:141_7: pavattisambhavato. Yathā pana kusalaṁ gativasena pañcavidhaṁ, viññāṇaṭṭhitivasena
anya-e0104n2:141_8: sattavidhañca, na evamidaṁ tadekadese eva uppajjanato. Tattha ārammaṇato, ekaccapavattiākārato
anya-e0104n2:141_9: ca visadisataṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘yathā panā’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Chasu ārammaṇesūti parittādiatītādiajjhattādippabhedesu chasu ārammaṇesu.
anya-e0104n2:142_0: Āgamanādivasenāti āgamanapaccayavasena. Tattha ekaccānaṁ ācariyānaṁ matena mukhe
anya-e0104n2:142_1: calite ādāsatale mukhanimittaṁ calanaṁ viya asaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko asaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n2:142_2: sasaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko sasaṅkhāroti evaṁ āgamanavasena. Ekaccānaṁ pana ācariyānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:142_3: matena balavantehi vibhūtehi paccayehi kammādīhi uppanno asaṅkhāro, dubbalehi sasaṅkhāroti
anya-e0104n2:142_4: evaṁ paccayavasena. Sampayuttadhammānanti pāḷiyaṁ sarūpato āgatasampayuttadhammānaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:142_5: Tesaṁ hi vasena kusalato vipākassa visesābhāvo. Nirussāhanti ettha ussāho nāma anupacchinnāvijjātaṇhāmānasantāne
anya-e0104n2:142_6: vipākuppādanasamatthatāsaṅkhāto byāpāro, so vipākesu natthīti taṁ nirussāhaṁ. Kusalesu
anya-e0104n2:143_0: Lobhādīnaṁ ekantasāvajjatāya ayonisomanasikārahetukānaṁ natthi vipākabhāvo, alobhādīnampi
anya-e0104n2:143_1: ekantaanavajjasabhāvānaṁ kāraṇassa tabbidhuratāya nattheva akusalavipākabhāvoti āha
anya-e0104n2:143_2: ‘‘akusalavipākaṁ ahetukamevā’’ti. Yathā atiiṭṭhe, iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedasabbhāvato
anya-e0104n2:143_3: kusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu duvidhā hoti somanassasahagatā, upekkhāsahagatāti, na
anya-e0104n2:143_4: evaṁ atianiṭṭhe, aniṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedo atthīti akusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0104n2:143_5: ekamevāti ‘‘sattavidha’’nti vuttaṁ. Sati hi tattha vedanābhede atianiṭṭhe domanassena
anya-e0104n2:143_6: bhavitabbaṁ, na ca paṭighena vinā domanassaṁ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0104n2:144_0: Kāyaviññāṇassa dukkhasahagatatā kusalavipāke vuttavipariyāyena veditabbā. Upekkhā
anya-e0104n2:144_1: hīnāti ekantanihīnassa akusalassa vipākabhāvato upekkhāpi samānā hīnā eva dukkhasabhāvattā.
anya-e0104n2:144_2: Tenāha ‘‘dukkhaṁ viyanātitikhiṇā’’ti. Yathā dukkhaṁ ativiya tikhiṇaṁ kaṭukaṁ, na
anya-e0104n2:144_3: evamayaṁ, tathāpi dukkhasabhāveneva pavattati. Na hi akusalassa vipāko adukkho hoti.
anya-e0104n2:144_4: Upekkhābhāvo cassa balavatā bādhiyamānassa paṭippaharituṁ asakkontassa dubbalassa
anya-e0104n2:144_5: purisassa tena kariyamānabādhāya upekkhanā viyāti daṭṭhabbo. Itaresūti kusalavipākesu.
anya-e0104n2:145_0: Rūpāvacaranti rūpāvacaravipākaviññāṇaṁ. Vipākakathā hesāti. Kusalaṁ viyāti rūpāvacarakusalaṁ
anya-e0104n2:145_1: viya. Na hi rūpāvacaravipāko tadaññakusalasadiso. Apica sambandhisaddā ete, yadidaṁ
anya-e0104n2:145_2: ‘‘kusalaṁ, vipāko’’ti ca. Tasmā yathā ‘‘mātaraṁ payirupāsatī’’ti vutte attano mātaranti
anya-e0104n2:145_3: avuttampi siddhamevetaṁ, evaṁ idhāpīti attano kusalaṁ viyāti attho. Kusalasadisatā
anya-e0104n2:145_4: cettha dhammato, ārammaṇato ca veditabbā. Tathā hi ye phassādayo kusale labbhanti,
anya-e0104n2:145_5: te vipākepi labbhanti. Yasmiṁ ca ārammaṇe kusalaṁ pavattati, tattheva ayaṁ vipākopi
anya-e0104n2:145_6: pavattati. Yaṁ panettha pañcamajjhānacittaṁ abhiññāppattaṁ, tassa vipāko eva natthi.
anya-e0104n2:145_7: Kasmā natthi? Asambhavato, ānisaṁsabhūtattā ca. Tañhi vipākaṁ dentaṁ rūpāvacarameva
anya-e0104n2:145_8: dadeyya. Na hi aññabhūmikaṁ kammaṁ aññabhūmikaṁ vipākaṁ deti. Kammanimittārammaṇatā
anya-e0104n2:145_9: ca rūpāvacaravipākassa vuttāti na taṁ aññaṁ ārabbha pavattati. Parittārammaṇādiārammaṇañca
anya-e0104n2:145_10: taṁ na hotīti ayamasambhavo. Jhānassa ānisaṁsabhūtañca dānādīnaṁ tasmiṁ attabhāve
anya-e0104n2:146_0: Pavattito pana vipākassa, kusalassa ca attheva bhedoti taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘kusalaṁ panā’’tiādi
anya-e0104n2:146_1: vuttaṁ. Kusalaṁ viya kasiṇugghāṭimākāsādiārammaṇabhedato catubbidhaṁ. Pavattibhedo
anya-e0104n2:147_2: vā phalasamāpattiyaṁ aparicchinnaparimāṇaṁ pavattamānampi dvīsu ṭhānesu pavattiyā
anya-e0104n2:147_3: ‘‘dvidhā pavattatī’’ti vuttaṁ. Sabbampīti tevīsatividhaṁ kāmāvacaravipākaṁ, pañcavidhaṁ
anya-e0104n2:148_0: Bhūmibhedatotividhaṁ lokuttarassa abhāvato. Lokuttarañhi kiriyacittaṁ natthi ekantena
anya-e0104n2:148_2: su. ni. 228). Hotu tāva sekkhānaṁ uppajjamānaṁ anuttaraṁ kusalaṁ puggalantarabhāvūpanayanato
anya-e0104n2:148_3: saphalaṁ, arahato pana uppajjamānaṁ puggalantarabhāvūpanayanato nipphalaṁ, tassa
anya-e0104n2:148_4: kiriyabhāvo kasmā na icchitoti? Icchitabbo siyā. Yadi tassa punappunaṁ uppatti siyā,
anya-e0104n2:148_5: sakiṁyeva pana lokuttarakusalaṁ pavattati. Yadi hi punappunaṁ pavatteyya, maggacittaṁ
anya-e0104n2:148_6: arahatopi pavattatīti lokuttarakiriyacittaṁ siyā, na cetaṁ atthi payojanābhāvato.
anya-e0104n2:148_7: Tasmā natthi lokuttarakiriyaviññāṇaṁ. Kiriyaviññāṇanti ca kiriyāmattaṁ viññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:148_8: kusalākusalaṁ viya kiñci vipākaṁ anuppādetvā kiriyāmattameva hutvā pavattanakaviññāṇanti
anya-e0104n2:148_9: attho. Kasmā panetaṁ vipākaṁ na uppādetīti? Vuccate – ettha hi yadetaṁ āvajjanadvayaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:148_10: taṁ anupacchinnabhavamūlepi santāne pavattaṁ anāsevanatāya dubbalabhāvato abījasāmatthiyaṁ
anya-e0104n2:148_11: viya pupphaṁ aphalameva hoti. Yaṁ pana ucchinnabhavamūlāyaṁ santatiyaṁ pavattaṁ aṭṭhārasavidhaṁ
anya-e0104n2:148_12: viññāṇaṁ, taṁ samucchinnamūlāya latāya pupphaṁ viya phaladāyi na hotīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:148_13: Aññassa asambhavato kiriyahetunā nāma alobhādināva bhavitabbanti āha ‘‘alobhādikiriyahetuvirahita’’nti.
anya-e0104n2:149_1: Ayaṁ pana manoviññāṇato uppannāpi visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvena manomattā dhātūti manodhātu.
anya-e0104n2:149_2: Tathā hesā manoviññāṇassa paccayo na hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana dhātuniddese
anya-e0104n2:149_3: (visuddhi. 2.517) āgamissati. Āvajjanarasāti ābhogarasā, cittasantānassa vā purimākārato
anya-e0104n2:149_5: Apubbārammaṇā sakideva pavattamānā sabbathā visayarasaṁ anubhavituṁ na sakkotīti
anya-e0104n2:150_0: Sādhāraṇāti sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṁ sādhāraṇā. Asādhāraṇāti asekkhānaṁyeva āveṇikā.
anya-e0104n2:150_1: Voṭṭhabbanāvajjanarasāti pañcadvāre santīraṇena gahitārammaṇaṁ vavatthapentī viya
anya-e0104n2:150_2: pavattanato voṭṭhabbanarasā, manodvāre pana vuttanayena āvajjanarasā. Tathābhāvena
anya-e0104n2:150_5: yassa kassaci bhavaṅgassāti imesaṁ aññatarāpagamo etissā āsannakāraṇanti āha ‘‘ahetuka…pe… padaṭṭhānā’’ti.
anya-e0104n2:151_1: aññesu vā appaṇītesu vatthūsu. Hasituppādanarasāti hasitasseva uppādanarasā. Tathā
anya-e0104n2:151_2: hi taṁ cittaṁ ‘‘hasituppādana’’ntveva vuccati, na aññesaṁ hasituppādakacittānaṁ abhāvato.
anya-e0104n2:151_3: Aññānipi hi dvādasa somanassasahagatāni parittakusalākusalakiriyacittāni yathārahaṁ
anya-e0104n2:151_4: puthujjanādīnaṁ hasituppādakāni vijjanti, idaṁ pana cittaṁ vicāraṇapaññāvirahitaṁ
anya-e0104n2:151_5: parittesu appaṇītesu ārammaṇesu arahantānaṁ somanassamattaṁ uppādentaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0104n2:151_6: Bhagavatopi uppajjatīti aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ atītaṁsādīsu appaṭihatañāṇaṁ vatvā
anya-e0104n2:151_7: ‘‘imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato sabbaṁ kāyakammaṁ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṁ
anya-e0104n2:151_9: 3.5) vacanato vicāretabbanti eke . Tattha hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi bhagavato
anya-e0104n2:151_11: evaṁ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷiaṭṭhakathānaṁ virodho. Evañca katvā
anya-e0104n2:151_12: aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘tesaṁ ñāṇānaṁ ciṇṇapariyante idaṁ cittaṁ uppajjatī’’ti vuttaṁ. Avassañca
anya-e0104n2:151_13: etaṁ evaṁ icchitabbaṁ, aññathā aññassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa ahetukacittassa
anya-e0104n2:151_14: bhagavato uppatti na yujjeyya. Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa taṁsamuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā
anya-e0104n2:151_15: kāyakammādibhāvaṁ āpajjanabhāvo vibandhatīti. Ekantato hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānā pañcavokārabhave eva uppajjanato.
anya-e0104n2:152_0: Ayamettha visesoti ayaṁ sekkhaputhujjanānaṁ uppattiyā vipākuppādanasamatthatā, arahataṁ
anya-e0104n2:152_1: uppattiyā tadabhāvoti ubhayesaṁ santāne uppattisamupalakkhito ettha kusalakiriyaviññāṇesu
anya-e0104n2:152_2: viseso. Evañca katvā paccayavekallena avipākassāpi kusalākusalassa kiriyabhāvappasaṅgo
anya-e0104n2:152_3: nivattito hoti. Parato kusalato visesoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n2:153_1: adhippāyo. Paṭisandhiviññāṇādīnaṁ kiccaṁ nāma bhavantarapaṭisandhādinā ākārena pavatti
anya-e0104n2:153_2: eva. Tabbinimuttañca cittassa aññaṁ kiccaṁ natthīti āha ‘‘cuddasahi ākārehi pavattantī’’ti.
anya-e0104n2:154_0: Ānubhāvenāti sāmatthiyena. Katūpacitaṁ hi kammaṁ avasesapaccayasamavāye vipākaṁ dentaṁ
anya-e0104n2:154_1: attano ānubhāvaṁ vissajjantaṁ viya hoti. Devamanussesūti chasu kāmāvacaradevesu ceva
anya-e0104n2:154_2: manussesu ca. Kammakammanimittagatinimittānanti ettha kammaṁ nāma katūpacitaṁ kāmāvacarakusalakammaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:154_3: tañca kho vipākadānāya laddhokāsaṁ. Tenāha ‘‘paccupaṭṭhita’’nti. Kammanimittaṁ kammāyūhanakkhaṇe
anya-e0104n2:154_4: cetanāya paccayabhūtaṁ deyyadhammādi. Gatinimittaṁ yaṁ gatiṁ upapajjati, tappariyāpannaṁ
anya-e0104n2:154_7: bhāvitarūpārūpāvacarakusalānaṁ sattānaṁ. Kammanimittamevāti pathavīkasiṇādikaṁ attano kammārammaṇameva.
anya-e0104n2:155_0: Evaṁtāvetthāti ettha viññāṇakkhandhaniddese evaṁ saṅkhepato sarūpadassanamatteneva
anya-e0104n2:155_1: ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṁ paṭisandhivasena pavatti veditabbā. Bhavālambanādivibhāgena
anya-e0104n2:155_2: pana yadettha vattabbaṁ, taṁ paṭiccasamuppādakathāyaṁ āgamissatīti.
anya-e0104n2:156_0: Taṁ tanti ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhiviññāṇesu yaṁ yaṁ uppajjitvā niruddhaṁ, taṁ taṁ
anya-e0104n2:156_1: anantaraṁ uppattiyā anubandhamānaṁ. Tassa tassevāti yassa yassa kammassa vipākabhūtaṁ
anya-e0104n2:156_2: paṭisandhiviññāṇaṁ, tassa tasseva. Tasmiññevāti kammādike eva. Kammañce paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n2:156_3: ārammaṇaṁ, tasmiṁ kamme, atha kammanimittaṁ, gatinimittañca, tasmiṁ kammanimitte
anya-e0104n2:156_4: gatinimitteti attho. Tādisamevāti yādisaṁ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṁ hetuto, sesasampayuttadhammato
anya-e0104n2:156_5: ca tādisameva. Santānavinivattaketi bhavaṅgasantānassa vinivattanake. Aññasmiṁ āvajjanasaṅkhāte
anya-e0104n2:156_6: cittuppāde. Kiriyamayacitteneva supinadassanaṁ hotīti āha ‘‘supinaṁ apassato’’ti.
anya-e0104n2:156_7: Aparimāṇasaṅkhyampi pavattatiyeva, tathā hidaṁ upapattibhavassa aṅgabhāvena pavattanato
anya-e0104n2:157_0: Indriyānīti cakkhādīni indriyāni. Ārammaṇagahaṇakkhamānīti rūpādiārammaṇaṁ gahetuṁ
anya-e0104n2:157_1: samatthāni. Mātukucchigatakāle viya hi bahinikkhantakālepi na tāva indriyāni sakiccakāni
anya-e0104n2:157_2: honti, anukkamena pana visadabhāvaṁ pattakāle eva sakiccakāni honti. Tenevāha ‘‘idha
anya-e0104n2:157_3: paripakkattā āyatanāna’’nti. Āpāthagateti yogyadesāvaṭṭhite. Tameva yogyadesāvaṭṭhitaṁ
anya-e0104n2:157_4: rūpaṁ paṭicca ghaṭṭanā paccayaṁ laddhā. Ghaṭṭanāti paṭighāto, yena byāpārādivisesapaccayantarasahite
anya-e0104n2:157_6: upaghāto cāti attho. Tatoti ghaṭṭanānantaraṁ. Ghaṭṭanānubhāvenāti ghaṭṭanābalena.
anya-e0104n2:157_7: Bhavaṅgacalananti bhavaṅgacittassa pakampanaṁ, tathā dvikkhattuṁ pavattiyā visadisassa
anya-e0104n2:157_8: kāraṇabhāvūpagamananti attho. Tañhi cittasantānassa purimāvatthāya bhinnāvatthāhetutāya
anya-e0104n2:157_9: calanaṁ viyāti ‘‘calana’’nti vuttaṁ. Visayavisayībhāvasiddhāya dhammatāya ārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n2:157_10: abhimukhībhāvena pasādassa tāva ghaṭṭanā hotu, aññasannissitassa pana bhavaṅgassa
anya-e0104n2:157_11: calanaṁ kathaṁ hotīti? Taṁsambandhabhāvato. Bheritale ṭhapitāsu sakkharāsu ekissā
anya-e0104n2:157_12: sakkharāya ghaṭitāya tadaññasakkharāyaṁ ṭhitamakkhikā calanaṁ cettha udāharaṇanti.
anya-e0104n2:157_13: Tadeva rūpanti tadeva bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayabhūtaṁ āpāthagataṁ rūpāyatanaṁ. Bhavaṅgaṁ
anya-e0104n2:157_14: vicchindamānā viyāti bhavaṅgasantānaṁ vicchindantī viya. Tadārammaṇuppattiyā parato
anya-e0104n2:157_15: bhavaṅgassa uppajjanato visayaggahaṇaṁ pañcadvārāvajjanaṁ vatvā tadanantaraṁ dassanādīsu
anya-e0104n2:157_16: vattabbesu tāni avatvā manodvārāvajjanassa gahaṇaṁ uddese dvinnaṁ āvajjanānaṁ āvajjanasāmaññena gahitattā.
anya-e0104n2:158_0: Āvajjanānantaranti pañcadvārāvajjanānantaraṁ. Ye hadayavatthu viya sampaṭicchanādivīthicittānipi
anya-e0104n2:158_2: pāḷi āgatā. Na hi sakkā pāḷiṁ paṭisedhetuṁ.
anya-e0104n2:159_0: ‘‘Sacemahantaṁ hotī’’ti idaṁ javanapariyosānāya cittappavattiyā vuccamānattā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:160_0: Yathāvavatthāpiteti voṭṭhabbanena vuttākārena katavavatthāpane. Āvajjanāya, voṭṭhabbanassa
anya-e0104n2:160_1: ca vuttattā ‘‘avasesakāmāvacarakiriyāna’’nti avasesaggahaṇaṁ kataṁ. Cha satta vāti
anya-e0104n2:160_2: vā-saddena ‘‘pañca vā’’ti idampi vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Suttamucchitādikāle hi pañcapi javanāni javantīti.
anya-e0104n2:161_1: Ito aññaṁ manodvārāvajjanānantaraṁ uppajjanakacittaṁ nāma natthīti dassanatthaṁ evakāraggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:161_2: ‘‘Gotrabhūto’’ti idaṁ gotrabhuṭṭhāniyānaṁ parikammavodānānampi gahaṇaṁ, na gotrabhuno
anya-e0104n2:161_3: eva. Phalacittānīti samāpattivasena pavattanakaphalacittāni. Yaṁ yaṁ laddhapaccayanti
anya-e0104n2:161_4: yaṁ yaṁ javanaṁ rūpāvacarajavanādivasena gotrabhuanantaraṁ uppattiyā laddhapaccayaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:162_0: Atimahantanti soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukaṁ. Tattha hi tadārammaṇacittaṁ uppajjati, na aññattha.
anya-e0104n2:162_1: Vibhūtanti supākaṭaṁ, tañca kāmāvacarameva. Tattha hi tadārammaṇassa uppatti. Kāmāvacarajavanāvasāneti
anya-e0104n2:162_2: kāmāvacarajavanasseva avasāne. Na hi taṁ kāmataṇhāhetukakammanibbattaṁ mahaggatānuttarajavanaṁ
anya-e0104n2:162_3: anubandhati ajanakattā, janakāsadisattā ca. Yathā gehato bahi gantukāmo taruṇadārako
anya-e0104n2:162_4: janakaṁ, janakasadisaṁ vā anubandhati, na aññaṁ, evamidampi . Tatthāpi na sabbasmā
anya-e0104n2:162_5: javanā sabbaṁ javanena tadārammaṇassa niyametabbato, ārammaṇena ca vedanāya parivattetabbato.
anya-e0104n2:162_7: atimahati visaye pañcannaṁ somanassasahagatānaṁ aññataraṁ tadārammaṇaṁ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n2:162_9: channaṁ tadārammaṇānaṁ aññataraṁ pavattati. Iṭṭhārammaṇādīnanti iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhārammaṇānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:162_10: vasenāti sambandho. Tayidaṁ ārammaṇena vedanāparivattidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. ‘‘Purimakammavasenā’’ti
anya-e0104n2:162_11: idaṁ tadārammaṇavisesadassanatthaṁ. Na hi paṭisandhijanakameva kammaṁ tadārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0104n2:162_12: janeti, atha kho aññakammampi. Taṁ pana paṭisandhidāyinā kammena nibbattetabbatadārammaṇato
anya-e0104n2:162_14: ‘‘Javanena tadārammaṇaṁ niyametabba’’nti hi vuttaṁ. Ādi-saddena paṭisandhicittaṁ
anya-e0104n2:162_15: saṅgaṇhāti. Tañhi attano ukkaṭṭhatarassa tadārammaṇassa paccayo na hoti. Yo yo paccayo
anya-e0104n2:162_16: laddho hotīti yathāvuttesu iṭṭhārammaṇādīsu yo yo tadārammaṇassa uppattiyā paccayo
anya-e0104n2:162_17: samaveto hoti. Kiñci antaranti kiñci khaṇantaraṁ. Udakamivāti paṭisotaṁ gacchantaṁ udakamiva.
anya-e0104n2:163_0: Dvikkhattuṁ sakiṁ vāti vacanasiliṭṭhavasena vuttaṁ ‘‘aṭṭha vā dasa vā’’tiādīsu (a.
anya-e0104n2:163_1: ni. 8.11; pārā. 11) viya. Dvikkhattuṁyeva pana vaṇṇenti. Vipākacittattā, āvajjanassa
anya-e0104n2:163_2: ca vidūrattā, mūlabhavaṅgādibhavaṅgasāmaññasabbhāvato ca bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇe pavattanārahaṁ
anya-e0104n2:163_3: samānaṁ tassa javanassa ārammaṇaṁ ārammaṇaṁ etassāti tadārammaṇanti vuccati ekassa
anya-e0104n2:163_4: ārammaṇasaddassa lopaṁ katvā ‘‘kāmāvacaraṁ, oṭṭhamukha’’nti ca yathā. Ettha ca keci
anya-e0104n2:163_6: vipākadhammadhammānaṁ eva anantaraṁ tadārammaṇaṁ vutta’’nti kiriyājavanānantaraṁ
anya-e0104n2:163_7: na icchanti. Vipphāravantaṁ hi javanaṁ nāvaṁ viya nadīsoto bhavaṅgaṁ anubandhati,
anya-e0104n2:163_8: na pana chaḷaṅgupekkhāvato santavuttikiriyajavanaṁ paṇṇapuṭaṁ viya nadīsototi. Tayidaṁ
anya-e0104n2:163_9: labbhamānassāpi kenaci adhippāyena katthaci avacanaṁ dissati, yathā taṁ dhammasaṅgahe
anya-e0104n2:163_10: akusalaniddese labbhamānopi adhipati na vutto. Yañca paṇṇapuṭaṁ nidassitaṁ, tampi
anya-e0104n2:163_11: nidassitabbena na samānaṁ. Nāvāpaṇṇapuṭānañhi nadīsotassa āvaṭṭanaṁ, gati ca visadisīti
anya-e0104n2:163_12: nāvāya nadīsotassa anubandhanaṁ, paṇṇapuṭassa ananubandhanañca yujjati, idha pana
anya-e0104n2:163_13: kiriyajavanetarajavanānaṁ bhavaṅgasotassa āvaṭṭanaṁ, gati ca sadisīti etassa ananubandhanaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:163_14: itarassa anubandhanañca na yujjati. Tasmā vicāretabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:164_0: Bhavaṅgamevāti avadhāraṇaṁ bhavapariyosānassa idha na adhippetattā. Aññathā tadārammaṇāvasāne
anya-e0104n2:164_1: cutipi na hotiyeva. Dassanādīnīti dassanasavanaghāyanasāyanaphusanāni. Iti-saddo
anya-e0104n2:164_2: ādiattho, tena sampaṭicchanādīnaṁ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Paṭisandhito bhavaṅgameva, bhavaṅgato
anya-e0104n2:164_3: āvajjanamevāti evaṁ pavattacittaniyamavaseneva. Tampīti cuticittampi. Paṭisandhibhavaṅgacittāni
anya-e0104n2:165_0: Bhavagatiṭhitinivāsesūti tīsu bhavesu, pañcasu gatīsu, sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu, navasu
anya-e0104n2:165_1: sattāvāsesu ca. Yo panettha acittako, so idha na gahetabbo viññāṇakathābhāvato. ‘‘Etthā’’ti
anya-e0104n2:165_2: idaṁ ‘‘saṁsaramānānaṁ sattāna’’nti iminā sambandhitabbaṁ. Ettha etesu vuttanayena
anya-e0104n2:165_3: saṁsaramānesu sattesu yo pana arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti sammāpaṭipattimanvāyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n2:165_4: Tassa arahato niruddhameva hoti cittaṁ appaṭisandhikabhāvato.
anya-e0104n2:168_0: 456. Vedena anubhavanākārena ayitaṁ pavattaṁ vedayitaṁ, vedayitanti lakkhitabbadhammajātaṁ
anya-e0104n2:168_1: vedayitalakkhaṇaṁ. Taṁ pana atthato vedanā evāti āha ‘‘vedayitalakkhaṇaṁ nāma vedanāvā’’ti.
anya-e0104n2:168_2: Atha vā vedayitaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etissāti kappanāsiddhaṁ bhedaṁ nissāya aññapadatthasamāsavasenāpi
anya-e0104n2:168_3: vedanāva vuccatīti āha ‘‘vedayitalakkhaṇaṁ nāma vedanāvā’’ti. Vedayati vedayatīti
anya-e0104n2:168_4: byāpanicchāvasena vacanaṁ vedanāya savisaye abhiṇhappavattidassanatthaṁ. Sabhāvadhammato
anya-e0104n2:168_5: añño kattā natthīti dassanatthaṁ kattuniddeso. Itīti aniyamato hetuattho. Khoti vacanālaṅkāramattaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:168_6: Tasmāti tassa niyamanaṁ. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yasmā yathāpaccayaṁ ārammaṇarasaṁ anubhavati,
anya-e0104n2:169_0: ‘‘Kusalaviññāṇenasampayuttā’’ti idaṁ kusalāya vedanāya upalakkhaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Yā
anya-e0104n2:169_1: kāci kusalā vedanā, sabbā sā kusalena viññāṇena sampayuttāti, na pana tassā kusalabhāvasaṁsiddhidassanatthaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:169_2: Na hi kusalena viññāṇena sampayogato kusalāya vedanāya kusalabhāvo, atha kho yonisomanasikārādikato.
anya-e0104n2:169_3: Tenāha ‘‘jātivasenā’’ti. Akusalādīsupi eseva nayo. Yathā pana jātivasena kusalādiviññāṇasampayuttatāya
anya-e0104n2:169_4: tividhā, evaṁ yāva ekūnanavutiviññāṇasampayuttāti ekūnanavutividhā veditabbā. Sabhāvabhedatoti
anya-e0104n2:169_5: sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇādivasena labbhamānaṁ bhedaṁ aggahetvā kevalaṁ sabhāvakatabhedato evāti attho.
anya-e0104n2:170_0: ‘‘Pañcavidhā’’ti vatvā taṁ pañcavidhataṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sukha’’ntiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha
anya-e0104n2:170_1: sukhayatīti sukhaṁ, kāyaṁ, sampayuttadhamme ca laddhassāde karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu
anya-e0104n2:170_2: vā khādati, khaṇati vā kāyikaṁ ābādhanti sukhaṁ. Sukaraṁ okāsadānaṁ etassāti sukhanti
anya-e0104n2:170_3: apare. Dukkhayatīti dukkhaṁ, kāyaṁ, sampayuttadhamme ca vibādhatīti attho. Duṭṭhu
anya-e0104n2:170_4: vā khādati, khaṇati vā kāyikaṁ assādanti dukkhaṁ. Dukkaraṁ okāsadānaṁ etassāti dukkhanti
anya-e0104n2:170_5: apare. Somanassupekkhānaṁ saddattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Domanassassa somanasse vuttanayānusārena
anya-e0104n2:170_6: veditabbaṁ. Kiṁ pana kāraṇaṁ mānasetarasātāsātavasena sukhaṁ, dukkhañca vibhajitvā
anya-e0104n2:170_7: vuttaṁ ‘‘sukhaṁ somanassaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassa’’nti, upekkhā pana mānasī, itarā ca
anya-e0104n2:170_8: ekadhāva vuttāti? Bhedābhāvato. Yathā hi anuggahūpaghātakatāya sukhadukkhāni aññathā
anya-e0104n2:170_9: kāyassa anuggahamupaghātañca karonti, aññathā manaso, na evamupekkhā. Tasmā bhedābhāvato
anya-e0104n2:171_0: Tattha yena sabhāvabhedena vedanā pañcavidhā, sā pavattiṭṭhāne dassite supākaṭā hotīti
anya-e0104n2:171_1: pavattiṭṭhānaṁ tāva dassetuṁ ‘‘tatthā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ. Akusalavipākenāti etthāpi
anya-e0104n2:171_3: kappāsapicupiṇḍaṁ ṭhapetvā ayokūṭena paharantassa picupiṇḍaṁ atikkamitvā kūṭaṁ adhikaraṇiṁ
anya-e0104n2:171_4: gaṇhāti, nighaṁso balavā hoti, evaṁ paṭighaṭṭanānighaṁsassa balavabhāvato iṭṭhe,
anya-e0104n2:171_5: iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe kāyaviññāṇaṁ sukhasahagataṁ hoti. Aniṭṭhe, aniṭṭhamajjhatte
anya-e0104n2:171_6: ca dukkhasahagatanti āha ‘‘kusala…pe… dukkha’’nti. Kāmāvacaravipākaviññāṇāni pañca
anya-e0104n2:171_7: kammārammaṇavasena somanassasahagatāni honti, rūpāvacaravipākāni cattāri kammavasena,
anya-e0104n2:171_8: sesāni terasa kāmāvacarāni, aṭṭha rūpāvacarāni, dvattiṁsa lokuttarāni, yathārahaṁ
anya-e0104n2:171_10: dvāsaṭṭhiyā viññāṇehi sampayutta’’nti. Domanassaṁ dvīhi akusalaviññāṇehi sampayuttaṁ
anya-e0104n2:172_0: Avasesapañcapaññāsāyāti yathāvuttāni chasaṭṭhi viññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasesāya pañcapaññāsāya.
anya-e0104n2:172_2: bhavituṁ yuttānipi dvinnaṁ picupiṇḍānaṁ viya dvinnaṁ dvinnaṁ upādārūpānaṁ ghaṭṭanānighaṁsassa
anya-e0104n2:172_3: mandabhāvato cakkhādisannissitāni aṭṭhapi viññāṇāni sabbattha upekkhāsampayuttāneva
anya-e0104n2:172_4: honti, tathā balavapaccayatāya sukhadukkhānaṁ tesañca tadabhāvato. Apubbārammaṇanissayappavattīni
anya-e0104n2:172_8: honti. Kammavasena vā vipākānubhavanassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇesu adukkhamasukhabhāvo
anya-e0104n2:172_9: yutto. Sati ca vipākabhūtāya upekkhāya sukhadukkhamajjhattabhāve kammārammaṇavasena
anya-e0104n2:172_10: kusalavipākāya iṭṭhabhāvo, akusalavipākāya aniṭṭhabhāvo ca veditabbo. Avasiṭṭhāni
anya-e0104n2:172_12: hontīti evaṁ pañcapaññāsāya viññāṇehi upekkhāya sampayuttatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n2:173_0: Salakkhaṇaṁ nāma dhammānaṁ anaññasādhāraṇo sabhāvo, anubhavanañca sabbavedanānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:173_1: sādhāraṇalakkhaṇanti taṁ paṭiniyatena ārammaṇena niyametvā dassento āha ‘‘iṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbānubhavanalakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0104n2:173_2: sukha’’nti tassa byabhicārābhāvato. Bhusaṁ brūhanaṁ vaḍḍhanaṁ upabrūhanaṁ. Tayidaṁ
anya-e0104n2:173_3: kāmañca cetasikasukhepi labbhati, taṁ pana savikappakaṁ cetobhisaṅkhāravasenāpi hoti.
anya-e0104n2:173_4: Idantu nibbikappakaṁ sabhāvasiddhattā tato sātisayanti āha ‘‘sampayuttānaṁ upabrūhanarasa’’nti.
anya-e0104n2:173_5: Assādiyatīti assādo, sukhāvedanā. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘yaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhe
anya-e0104n2:173_6: paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhesu
anya-e0104n2:173_7: assādo’’ti (saṁ. ni. 3.26). Kāyanissitattā kāye bhavo kāyiko, so eva assādo tathā
anya-e0104n2:175_0: Sabhāvato , parikappato vā iṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa anubhavanalakkhaṇaṁ iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:175_1: Tenāha ‘‘yathā tathā vā iṭṭhākārasambhogarasa’’nti, yathābhūtena vā ayathābhūtena
anya-e0104n2:175_2: vā iṭṭhākārena ārammaṇassa saṁbhuñjanarasaṁ, paccanubhavanakiccanti attho. ‘‘Passaddhipadaṭṭhāna’’nti
anya-e0104n2:175_3: idaṁ ‘‘passaddhakāyo sukhaṁ vedetī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.376; a. ni. 11.12) suttapadaṁ
anya-e0104n2:175_4: nissāya vuttaṁ, taṁ pana nirāmisasomanassavasena veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:176: Somanasse vuttavipariyāyena domanassassa lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni. Domanassassa kāmadhātuyaṁ uppajjanato ekantena hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānatā tato viseso.
anya-e0104n2:177_0: Majjhattassa, ārammaṇassa majjhattaṁ vā vedayitaṁ anubhavanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etissāti
anya-e0104n2:177_2: ‘‘Santabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā’’ti idaṁ anavajjāya nirāmisāya upekkhāya vasena veditabbaṁ, na sabbāya.
anya-e0104n2:180: 457.Sañjānanalakkhaṇaṁ nāma saññāvātiādīsu yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ vedanākkhandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:181_0: Kāmaṁ vedanāyapi vippayuttaṁ viññāṇaṁ natthi, tassā pana sabhāvato bhinnattā kāyaci
anya-e0104n2:181_1: vedanāya sampayuttampi kāyaci vippayuttaṁ hoti. Saññāya pana īdisaṁ natthīti āha
anya-e0104n2:182_0: Sabbāvāti catubhūmikāpi. Atha vā yathā vedanā bhinnasabhāvattā bhedanalakkhaṇādito
anya-e0104n2:182_1: vuttā, na evamayaṁ, ayaṁ pana sabbāva sañjānanalakkhaṇā . Nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n2:182_2: sañjānanaṁ saññaṁ katvā jānanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etissāti sañjānanalakkhaṇā. Tathā hi sā
anya-e0104n2:182_3: abhiññāṇena sañjānanato paccābhiññāṇarasāti vuccati. Nimittena hi puna sañjānanakiccā
anya-e0104n2:182_4: paccābhiññāṇarasā. Tassā vaḍḍhakissa dārumhi abhiññāṇaṁ katvā tena abhiññāṇena paccābhijānanakāle
anya-e0104n2:182_5: pavatti veditabbā. Tenāha ‘‘tadeveta’’ntiādi. Puna sañjānanassa paccayo punasañjānanapaccayo,
anya-e0104n2:182_6: tadeva nimittaṁ puna…pe… nimittaṁ, tassa karaṇaṁ, puna…pe… karaṇaṁ, punasañjānanapaccayabhūtaṁ
anya-e0104n2:182_7: vā nimittakaraṇaṁ puna…pe… karaṇaṁ, tadassā kiccanti punasañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā.
anya-e0104n2:182_8: Punasañjānananimittakaraṇaṁ nimittakārikāya, nimittena sañjānanantiyā ca sabbāya
anya-e0104n2:182_9: saññāya samānaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Abhinivesakaraṇaṁ ‘‘idameva sacca’’nti (ma. ni. 2.187,
anya-e0104n2:182_11: avikappasabhāvattā. Ñāṇasampayuttā pana saññā ñāṇameva anuvattati, tasmā abhinivesakārikā,
anya-e0104n2:182_12: viparītaggāhikā ca na hoti. Eteneva samādhisampayuttatāya aciraṭṭhānatā ca na hotīti
anya-e0104n2:185_1: Cetanāpadhānatāya hi saṅkhārakkhandhadhammā evaṁ vuttā. Tenevāha ‘‘kiṁ pana tanti
anya-e0104n2:185_2: saṅkhārāyevā’’tiādi. Tattha saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti yathā attano phalaṁ saṅkhataṁ
anya-e0104n2:185_3: sammadeva nipphannaṁ hoti, evaṁ abhisaṅkharontīti attho. Vipphārapaccupaṭṭhānāti
anya-e0104n2:185_4: ettha vipphāro nāma vipphāravantatā, tasmā sabyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānāti attho.
anya-e0104n2:186_0: Tasmiṁ tasmiṁ citte uppanne niyamena uppajjanato niyatā. Sarūpena āgatāti evaṁ piṭṭhivattake
anya-e0104n2:186_1: akatvā pāḷiyā sarūpeneva āgatā. Kadācideva uppajjanato na niyatāti aniyatā. Yadipi
anya-e0104n2:186_2: aniyatā ekajjhaṁ na uppajjanti, tasmiṁ pana citte uppajjanadhammatāya ‘‘chattiṁsā’’ti
anya-e0104n2:186_3: vuttaṁ. Tenāha ‘‘uppajjamānāpi ca na ekato uppajjantī’’ti.
anya-e0104n2:187_0: 459.Phusatīti kattuniddeso. Yaṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ, taṁ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Phusanti etenāti
anya-e0104n2:187_1: vā phasso. Sampayuttadhammā hi ārammaṇe pavattamānā taṁ phusanalakkhaṇena phassena
anya-e0104n2:187_2: phusantā viya honti. Ārammaṇaphusanamattaṁ vā phassoti sādhanattayampi yujjateva.
anya-e0104n2:187_5: Yadi ayaṁ dhammo cetasiko, svāyaṁ arūpadhammo samāno kathaṁ phusanalakkhaṇo, saṅghaṭṭanarasādiko
anya-e0104n2:187_6: ca hotīti antolīnaṁ codanaṁ hadaye ṭhapetvā tassa sodhanatthaṁ ‘‘arūpadhammopi samāno’’tiādi
anya-e0104n2:187_7: vuttaṁ. Tattha ‘‘phusanākāreneva pavattatī’’ti iminā arūpassāpi tassa dhammassa ayaṁ
anya-e0104n2:187_8: sabhāvoti dasseti. Sā ca tassa phusanākārappavatti ambilaambapakkādiṁ khādantaṁ passantassa
anya-e0104n2:187_9: parassa kheḷuppatti, paraṁ vibādhiyamānaṁ disvā dayālukassa sarīrakampanaṁ, rukkhasākhagge
anya-e0104n2:187_10: duṭṭhitaṁ purisaṁ disvā bhūmiyaṁ ṭhitassa bhīrukapurisassa jaṅghacalanaṁ, pisācādibhāyitabbaṁ
anya-e0104n2:188_0: Ekadesenāti kaṭṭhadvayādi viya attano ekapassena. Anallīyamānopīti asaṁsiliyamānopi.
anya-e0104n2:188_1: Rūpasaddehi saha phassassa sāmaññaṁ anallīyamānasaṅghaṭṭanameva, na visayabhāvo.
anya-e0104n2:188_2: Yathā rūpasaddā cakkhusotāni anallīyamānā eva ‘‘phusita’’ntiādinā vuttā, evaṁ phassassāpi
anya-e0104n2:188_4: eva. Tenāha ‘‘cittamārammaṇañca saṅghaṭṭetī’’ti. Kiccaṭṭhena rasena saṅghaṭṭanarasatā
anya-e0104n2:188_5: vuttā, vatthārammaṇasannipātena vā sampajjatīti saṅghaṭṭanasampattiko phasso saṅghaṭṭanaraso
anya-e0104n2:188_6: vutto. Yathā ‘‘dve pāṇī vajjeyyu’’ntiādīsu (mi. pa. 2.3.8) pāṇissa pāṇimhi saṅghaṭṭanaṁ
anya-e0104n2:188_7: tabbisesabhūtā rūpadhammā, evaṁ cittassa ārammaṇe saṅghaṭṭanaṁ tabbisesabhūto eko
anya-e0104n2:188_9: 426; saṁ. ni. 2.43-44; 4.60) vacanato cakkhurūpaviññāṇādīnaṁ saṅgativasena gahetabbattā
anya-e0104n2:188_10: āha ‘‘tikasannipātasaṅkhātassā’’tiādi. Tassa phassassa kāraṇabhūto tadanurūpo samannāhāro
anya-e0104n2:188_11: tajjāsamannāhāro. Indriyassa tadabhimukhabhāvo, āvajjanāya ca ārammaṇakaraṇaṁ visayassa
anya-e0104n2:188_12: parikkhatatā abhisaṅkhatatā, viññāṇassa visayabhāvakaraṇanti attho. Yathā niccammā
anya-e0104n2:188_13: gāvī yaṁ yaṁ ṭhānaṁ upagatā, tattha tattha dukkhameva pāpuṇāti, evaṁ phasse sati
anya-e0104n2:188_14: vedanā uppajjateva. Vedanā ca dukkhasallādisabhāvāti vuttaṁ ‘‘vedanādhiṭṭhānabhāvato
anya-e0104n2:189_0: 460.Abhisandahati pabandhati pavatteti. Cetanābhāvo byāpārabhāvo. Āyūhanaṁ cetayanaṁ
anya-e0104n2:189_1: īriyanaṁ. Saṁvidahanaṁ vicāraṇaṁ. Āyūhanarasāya cetanāya pavattamānāya sabbepi sampayuttadhammā
anya-e0104n2:189_2: yathāsakaṁ kiccappasutā hontīti sā sakiccaparakiccasādhikā vuttā. Jeṭṭhasisso pare
anya-e0104n2:189_3: sajjhāyane uyyojento sayampi sajjhāyati. Mahāvaḍḍhakimhi vaḍḍhakikammaṁ kātumāraddhe
anya-e0104n2:189_4: itarepi karontiyeva. Ussāhanabhāvenāti ādarakaraṇabhāvena. Sā hi sayaṁ ādarabhūtā
anya-e0104n2:189_5: sampayuttadhamme ādarayatīti. Āyūhanavasena ussāhanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, na vīriyussāhavasena.
anya-e0104n2:190_0: 461.Vīrabhāvoti yena vīro nāma hoti, so dhammoti attho. Vidhinā īretabbaṁ pavattetabbanti
anya-e0104n2:190_1: vā vīriyaṁ, ussāho, taṁtaṁkiccasamārambho, parakkamo vā. Upatthambhanaṁ sampayuttadhammānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:190_2: kosajjapakkhe patituṁ adatvā dhāraṇaṁ anubalappadānaṁ, sampaggaṇhanaṁ vā. Saṁsīdanapaṭipakkho
anya-e0104n2:190_3: dhammo asaṁsīdanaṁ, na saṁsīdanābhāvamattanti asaṁsīdanabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0104n2:190_6: hoti, maggo gato, kammaṁ kātabbaṁ, kammaṁ kataṁ, appamattako ābādho uppanno, gilānā
anya-e0104n2:190_7: vuṭṭhito hoti, aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā, gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya vicaranto na labhati
anya-e0104n2:190_8: lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ, labhati…pe… pāripūri’’nti
anya-e0104n2:190_9: evaṁ vuttāni etāni anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūni, taṁmūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni.
anya-e0104n2:191_0: 462. Attanā anupāletabbānaṁ sahajātadhammānaṁ anupālanaṁ jīvitassa byāpāro, tañca
anya-e0104n2:191_1: nesaṁ jīvananti taṁ tassa kāraṇabhāvaṁ purakkhatvā vuttaṁ ‘‘jīvanti tenā’’ti. Tampi
anya-e0104n2:191_2: cassa atthato jīvanamevāti āha ‘‘jīvanamattameva vā ta’’nti.
anya-e0104n2:192_0: 463.Ādhiyatīti ṭhapeti. Avisāro attano eva avisaraṇasabhāvo. Avikkhepo sampayuttānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:192_1: dhammānaṁ avikkhittatā. Yena sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so dhammo avikkhepoti.
anya-e0104n2:192_2: Avūpasamalakkhaṇassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhatāya cittassa upasamanākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0104n2:192_3: upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno. Visesatoti yebhuyyena. Sukhavirahitopi hi atthi samādhīti.
anya-e0104n2:193_1: saddhāya paccayataṁ dasseti. Tassā hi dhammānaṁ tathāpaccayabhāve sati puggalo saddahatīti
anya-e0104n2:193_2: vohāro hoti. Saddahanaṁ saddheyyavatthuno pattiyāyanaṁ, taṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etissāti saddahanalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0104n2:193_3: Okappanalakkhaṇāti anupavisitvā evametanti kappanalakkhaṇā. Kālussiyamalaṁ vidhametvā
anya-e0104n2:193_4: sampayuttānaṁ, puggalasseva vā pasādanaṁ anāvilabhāvakaraṇaṁ raso etissāti pasādanarasā.
anya-e0104n2:193_5: Pakkhandanaṁ adhimuccanavasena ārammaṇassa anupavisanaṁ. Akālusabhāvo akālussiyaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:193_6: anāvilabhāvoti attho. Pasādanīyaṭṭhānesu pasādaviparītaṁ akusalaṁ assaddhiyaṁ, micchādhimutti
anya-e0104n2:193_7: ca, tappaccanīkova pasādabhūto vatthugato nicchayo adhimutti, na yevāpanakādhimokkho.
anya-e0104n2:193_9: sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Kusaladhammānaṁ ādāne hatthaṁ viya, sabbasampattisampadāne vittaṁ
anya-e0104n2:194_0: 465.Saranti tāyāti saraṇakiriyāya pavattamānānaṁ dhammānaṁ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena
anya-e0104n2:194_1: satiyā paccayataṁ dasseti. Tassā hi dhammānaṁ tathāpaccayabhāve sati taṁsamaṅgipuggalo
anya-e0104n2:194_2: saratīti vohāro hoti. Udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṁ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa
anya-e0104n2:194_3: ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṁ saraṇaṁ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṁ apilāpanaṁ. Sammosapaccanīkaṁ kiccaṁ
anya-e0104n2:194_4: asammoso, na sammosābhāvamattaṁ. ‘‘Satārakkhena cetasā’’ti (a. ni. 10.20) vacanato
anya-e0104n2:194_5: ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā. Aññato āgantvā cittavisaye abhimukho bhavati etāyāti visayābhimukhabhāvo,
anya-e0104n2:194_6: sati. Satiyā vatthubhūtā kāyādayova kāyādisatipaṭṭhānāni, sati eva vā purimā pacchimāya padaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:195_1: Tehiyevāti kāyaduccaritādīhiyeva. Ottappatīti ubbijjati. Hirī pāpadhamme gūthaṁ viya
anya-e0104n2:195_2: passantī jigucchatīti āha ‘‘pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī’’ti. Ottappaṁ te uṇhaṁ
anya-e0104n2:195_3: viya passantaṁ tato uttasatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘uttāsalakkhaṇaṁ ottappa’’nti. Vuttappakārenāti
anya-e0104n2:195_4: lajjākārena, uttāsākārena ca. Attagāravapadaṭṭhānā hirī ajjhattasamuṭṭhānatāya, attādhipatitāya
anya-e0104n2:195_5: ca. Paragāravapadaṭṭhānaṁ ottappaṁ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānatāya, lokādhipatitāya ca. Tamevatthaṁ
anya-e0104n2:195_6: pākaṭataraṁ kātuṁ ‘‘attānaṁhī’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā ca hiriottappānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:195_7: tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena vuttā, na panetesaṁ kadāci aññamaññavippayogā. Na hi
anya-e0104n2:195_8: lajjanaṁ nibbhayaṁ, pāpabhayaṁ vā alajjanaṁ atthīti. Lokapālakāti ettha ‘‘dveme,
anya-e0104n2:195_9: bhikkhave, sukkā dhammā lokaṁ pālentī’’ti (a. ni. 2.9; itivu. 42) suttapadaṁ attādhipati,
anya-e0104n2:195_10: lokādhipatibhāve ca ‘‘so attānaṁyeva adhipatiṁ karitvā, so lokaṁyeva adhipatiṁ karitvā’’ti
anya-e0104n2:196_0: 467. Yasmā lobhapaṭipakkho alobhoti ye dhammā tena sampayuttā, taṁsamaṅgino vā sattā
anya-e0104n2:196_1: tena na lubbhanti, sayaṁ kadācipi na lubbhateva, atthato vā alubbhanākāro eva ca
anya-e0104n2:196_2: hoti, tasmā vuttaṁ ‘‘na lubbhantī’’tiādi. Eseva nayoti ‘‘na dussanti tenā’’tiādinā
anya-e0104n2:196_3: kārakattayayojanaṁ atidisati. Agedho agijjhanaṁ anabhikaṅkhanaṁ. Alaggabhāvo anāsattatā.
anya-e0104n2:196_4: Apariggaho kassaci vatthuno mamattavasena asaṅgaho. Anallīno bhāvo adhippāyo etassāti
anya-e0104n2:197_0: 468. Caṇḍikassa bhāvo caṇḍikkaṁ, kopo. Tappaṭipakkho acaṇḍikkaṁ, abyāpādo. Avirodho
anya-e0104n2:197_1: aviggaho. Anukūlamitto anuvattako. Vinayarasoti vinayanaraso. Sommabhāvo mejjanavasena hilādanīyatā.
anya-e0104n2:198_0: 469. Dhammānaṁ yo yo sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo, tassa tassa paṭivijjhanaṁ yathāsabhāvapaṭivedho.
anya-e0104n2:198_1: Akkhalitaṁ avirajjhitvā paṭivedho akkhalitapaṭivedho. Visayassa obhāsanaṁ tappaṭicchādakasammohandhakāravidhamanaṁ
anya-e0104n2:198_2: visayobhāsanaṁ. Katthacipi visaye asammuyhanākāreneva paccupatiṭṭhati, sammohapaṭipakkhatāya
anya-e0104n2:198_3: vā tadabhāvaṁ paccupaṭṭhapetīti asammohapaccupaṭṭhāno. Sabbakusalānaṁ mūlabhūtāti
anya-e0104n2:198_5: tesaṁ kusalabhāvasādhanena. Yadi hi tesaṁ kusalabhāvo kusalamūlapaṭibaddho siyā,
anya-e0104n2:198_6: evaṁ sati taṁsamuṭṭhānarūpesu hetupaccayatā na siyā. Na hi te tesaṁ kusalādibhāvaṁ
anya-e0104n2:198_7: sādhenti, na ca paccayā na honti. Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘hetū hetusampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:198_8: taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo’’ti (paṭṭhā. 1.1.1). Yathā ca kusalabhāvo,
anya-e0104n2:198_9: evaṁ abyākatabhāvopi abyākatamūlappaṭibaddho siyā. Tathā sati ahetukacittānaṁ abyākatabhāvo
anya-e0104n2:198_10: eva na siyā, akusalesu ca yattha ekaṁyeva mūlaṁ, tassa akusalabhāvo na siyā, ubhayampi
anya-e0104n2:198_11: hotiyeva. Tasmā na mūlappaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo, atha kho yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho.
anya-e0104n2:199_0: 470.Passambhanaṁ darathavūpasamo. Kāyasaddo samūhavācī, so ca kho vedanādikkhandhattayavasenāti
anya-e0104n2:199_1: āha ‘‘kāyoti cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā’’ti. Tenevāha ‘‘tattha katamā tasmiṁ
anya-e0104n2:199_2: samaye kāyapassaddhi hoti? Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassā’’tiādi (dha. sa. 40).
anya-e0104n2:199_3: Daratho sārambho, domanassapaccayānaṁ uddhaccādhikānaṁ kilesānaṁ, tathāpavattānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:199_4: vā catunnaṁ khandhānaṁ etaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Darathanimmaddanena pariḷāhaparipphandavirahito
anya-e0104n2:199_5: sītibhāvo aparipphandasītibhāvo. Uddhaccappadhānā kilesā uddhaccādikilesā, uddhaccaṁ
anya-e0104n2:199_6: vā ādiṁ katvā sabbakilese saṅgaṇhāti. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n2:200: Garubhāvo dandhatā, thinamiddhādhikānaṁ, tathāpavattānaṁ vā catunnaṁ khandhānaṁ etaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Dandhatāya paṭipakkho adandhatā, na dandhatāya abhāvamattaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:201_0: Thaddhabhāvo thambho, diṭṭhimānādhikānaṁ, tappadhānānaṁ vā catunnaṁ khandhānametaṁ
anya-e0104n2:201_1: nāmaṁ. Thaddhabhāvanimmaddanato eva katthaci ārammaṇe appaṭihatākārena paccupatiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n2:201_2: sampayuttānaṁ vā tattha appaṭighātaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpentīti appaṭighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n2:202_0: Kammani sādhu kammaññaṁ, na kammaññaṁ akammaññaṁ, tassa bhāvo akammaññabhāvo, dānasīlādipuññakiriyāyaṁ
anya-e0104n2:202_1: ayogyatā. Atthato kāmacchandādisaṁkilesadhammā, tappadhānā vā cattāro akusalakkhandhā.
anya-e0104n2:202_2: Kammaññabhāveneva sampannākārena ārammaṇassa gahaṇaṁ ārammaṇakaraṇasampatti. Vuttāvasesā
anya-e0104n2:202_3: kāmacchandādayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca saṁkilesadhammā avasesanīvaraṇādayo. Vinibandhanimmaddanena
anya-e0104n2:202_4: sukhappavattihetutāya pasādanīyavatthūsu pasādāvahā. Suvaṇṇavisuddhi viyāti yathā
anya-e0104n2:203_0: Kāyacittānaṁ gelaññaṁ, assaddhiyādi, tadekaṭṭhā ca pāpadhammā. Gelaññapaṭipakkho
anya-e0104n2:203_1: agelaññaṁ , tabbhāvo lakkhaṇaṁ etāsanti agelaññabhāvalakkhaṇā. Yathāvuttagelaññanimmaddaneneva
anya-e0104n2:203_2: natthi etāsaṁ ādīnavo doso, na vā etā ādīnaṁ kapaṇaṁ vanti pavattantīti nirādīnavā,
anya-e0104n2:203_3: tenākārena paccupatiṭṭhanti, taṁ vā sampayuttesu paccupaṭṭhapentīti nirādīnavapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n2:204_0: Kāyasambandhī, cittasambandhī ca ujubhāvoti lakkhitabbatāya kāyacittaajjavalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0104n2:204_2: kāyacittakuṭilabhāvanimmaddanarasā. Tato eva sabbathāpi ajimhabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n2:204_4: māyā, asantaguṇasambhāvanalakkhaṇaṁ sāṭheyya’’nti evaṁ vuttā tadākārappavattā akusalā
anya-e0104n2:204_5: khandhā, tadekaṭṭhā ca saṁkilesadhammā māyāsāṭheyyādikā. Ettha ca cittapassaddhiādīhi
anya-e0104n2:204_6: cittameva passaddhaṁ, lahu, mudu, kammaññaṁ, paguṇaṁ, uju ca hoti. Kāyapassaddhiādīhi
anya-e0104n2:204_7: pana rūpakāyopi. Tenevettha bhagavatā dhammānaṁ duvidhatā vuttā, na sabbattha.
anya-e0104n2:205_1: pana taṇhāpi vuccati, ‘‘chandaṁ janeti vāyamatī’’tiādīsu (vibha. 432) vīriyampīti
anya-e0104n2:205_2: tato nivattanatthaṁ ‘‘kattukāmatāyetaṁ adhivacana’’nti vuttaṁ. Kattukāmatā vuccati
anya-e0104n2:205_3: karaṇicchā. Cetasikassa ca dhammassa sārammaṇattā karaṇicchā nāma ālambanassa ālambitukāmatāmukheneva
anya-e0104n2:205_4: hotīti ārammaṇakaraṇicchālakkhaṇo chando kattukāmatālakkhaṇo vutto. Tenevāha ‘‘ārammaṇapariyesanaraso,
anya-e0104n2:205_5: ārammaṇena atthikatāpaccupaṭṭhāno’’ti ca. Yadaggena panāyaṁ attano ārammaṇapariyesanaraso,
anya-e0104n2:205_6: tadaggena sampayuttānampi hotiyeva ekārammaṇatāya tena tesaṁ. Tenevāha ‘‘ārammaṇaggahaṇe
anya-e0104n2:205_7: cāyaṁ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṁ viya daṭṭhabbo’’ti. Svāyaṁ kusalesu uppanno kusalacchandoti
anya-e0104n2:206_0: 472.Adhimuccanaṁ ārammaṇe sanniṭṭhānavasena veditabbaṁ, na pasādanavasena. Yathā
anya-e0104n2:206_1: tathā vā hi ārammaṇe nicchayanaṁ adhimuccanaṁ anadhimuccantassa pāṇātipātādīsu, dānādīsu
anya-e0104n2:206_2: vā pavattiyā abhāvā, saddhā pana pasādanīyesu pasādādhimokkhāti ayametesaṁ viseso.
anya-e0104n2:206_3: Voṭṭhabbanaṁ pana yathā santīrite atthe nicchayanākārena pavattitvā parato ttamānānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:206_4: tathā pavattiyā paccayo hoti. Yadi evaṁ, vicikicchāsampayuttesu kathanti? Tesampi
anya-e0104n2:206_5: ekaṁseneva saṁsappanākārassa paccayatāya daṭṭhabbaṁ. Dārakassa viya ito cito ca saṁsappanassa
anya-e0104n2:206_6: ‘‘karissāmi na karissāmī’’ti anicchayassa paṭipakkhakiriyā asaṁsappanaṁ, yesu cittuppādesu
anya-e0104n2:206_7: ayaṁ sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo adhimokkho, tesaṁ ārammaṇadhammo eva sanniṭṭheyyadhammo.
anya-e0104n2:207_0: 473.Kiriyākāroti kārasaddassa bhāvasādhanatamāha. Manamhi kāroti manasi ārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n2:207_1: karaṇaṁ. Yena hi mano ārammaṇe karīyati ārammaṇenassa saṁyojanato, tato eva tena
anya-e0104n2:207_2: ārammaṇampi manasi karīyatīti. Purimamanatoti bhavaṅgamanato. Visadisamananti vīthijavanaṁ
anya-e0104n2:208_0: Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇābhimukhaṁ sārento viya hotīti manasikāro sāraṇalakkhaṇo
anya-e0104n2:208_2: pana saṁyojanavasena ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatāti ayametesaṁ viseso. Ārammaṇapaṭipādakassa
anya-e0104n2:208_4: jotetīti tathājotitaṁ taṁ viññāṇakkhandhe otāretvā dassetuṁ ‘‘vīthipaṭipādako’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:209_0: 474.Tesu dhammesūti yesu dhammesu sayaṁ uppannā, tesu attanā sampayuttesu cittacetasikadhammesu.
anya-e0104n2:209_1: Anārammaṇattepi hi tesu samappavattesu udāsinabhāvato ‘‘tatramajjhattatā’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0104n2:209_2: Samavāhitalakkhaṇāti samaṁ avisamaṁ yathāsakakiccesu pavattanalakkhaṇā. Udāsinabhāvena
anya-e0104n2:209_3: pavattamānāpi hesā sampayuttadhamme yathāsakakiccesu pavatteti, yathā rājā tuṇhī
anya-e0104n2:209_4: nisinnopi atthakaraṇe dhammaṭṭhe yathāsakakiccesu appamatte pavatteti. Alīnānuddhatapavattipaccayatā
anya-e0104n2:209_5: ūnādhikatānivāraṇarasā, kiccavasena cetaṁ vuttaṁ. Yadi evaṁ, sahajātādhipatino kathanti?
anya-e0104n2:209_6: Tampi tassā kiccameva. Yaṁ sahajātadhammānaṁ adhipatibhāvoti, tassāpi tathāpavattanamevāti
anya-e0104n2:209_7: nāyaṁ doso. ‘‘Idaṁ nihīnakiccaṁ hotu, idaṁ atirekatarakicca’’nti evaṁ pakkhapātavasena
anya-e0104n2:209_8: viya pavatti pakkhapāto, taṁ upacchindantī viya hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n2:210_0: ‘‘Aniyatesu icchantī’’ti iminā cetasikantarabhāvena icchantīti dasseti. Adosoyeva
anya-e0104n2:210_1: mettā. Tathā hi soyeva ‘‘mettā mettāyanā’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 1062) niddiṭṭho. Upekkhāti
anya-e0104n2:210_2: yaṁ upekkhaṁ mettāya saddhiṁ parikappenti, sā tatramajjhattupekkhāyeva.
anya-e0104n2:211_2: vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Na hi viratiyo duccaritavatthuno akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā yujjanti,
anya-e0104n2:211_3: atha kho duccaritassa, viratīnañca soraccavasena saṅkocanaṁ, akiriyānañca hirottappānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:212_0: 476.Saṅkhārāti saṅkhārakkhandhadhamme sandhāyāha. Te hi idhādhippetā, aññathā aṭṭhatiṁsāti
anya-e0104n2:212_1: vattabbaṁ siyā. Yathā cittaṁ, evaṁ taṁsampayuttadhammāpi dutiye sasaṅkhārā evāti
anya-e0104n2:212_2: āha ‘‘sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso’’ti. Avasesā paṭhame vuttadhammā.
anya-e0104n2:213_0: Avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṁ gacchantīti ettha kathaṁ karuṇāmuditāupekkhāsahagate
anya-e0104n2:213_1: sambhavantīti? Pubbabhāgabhāvato. Appanāppattā eva hi karuṇāmuditā upekkhāsahagatā
anya-e0104n2:213_2: na honti, tato aññattha pana upekkhāsahagatāpi hontīti ācariyā.
anya-e0104n2:214_1: na kāyakammādīnaṁ sodhanavasena, nāpi duccaritadurājīvānaṁ samucchindanapaṭippassambhanavasenāti
anya-e0104n2:214_3: Tatoti rūpāvacarapaṭhame vuttacetasikato. Teyevāti rūpāvacarapañcame vuttacetasikā
anya-e0104n2:214_4: eva. Yadi eva rūpāvacarato ko visesoti āha ‘‘arūpāvacarabhāvoyeva hi ettha viseso’’ti.
anya-e0104n2:215_0: Paṭhamajjhāniketi paṭhamajjhānavati. Maggaviññāṇeti catubbidhepi maggaviññāṇe vuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n2:215_1: veditabbāti sambandho. Dutiyajjhānikādibhede maggaviññāṇeti ettha ādi-saddena tatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānikāni
anya-e0104n2:215_2: saṅgaṇhāti. ‘‘Vuttanayenā’’ti vuttaṁ kiṁ avisesenāti codanāyane taṁ dassento ‘‘karuṇāmuditāna’’ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n2:215_3: Tattha maggaviññāṇānaṁ nibbānārammaṇattā, karuṇāmuditānañca sattārammaṇattā na tāsaṁ
anya-e0104n2:215_4: tattha sambhavo. Maggadhammesu ca pādakādiniyamena kadāci sammāsaṅkappaviraho siyā
anya-e0104n2:215_5: , na pana virativiraho kāyaduccaritādīnaṁ samucchindanavaseneva ariyamaggassa pavattanatoti niyataviratitā.
anya-e0104n2:216_0: 478.Na hiriyati na lajjatīti ahiriko, puggalo, cittaṁ, taṁsampayuttadhammasamudāyo
anya-e0104n2:216_1: vā. ‘‘Ahirikka’’nti vattabbe ekassa kakārassa lopaṁ katvā ‘‘ahirika’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:216_2: ‘‘Na ottappa’’nti ottappassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṁ dhammamāha. Ajigucchanaṁ ahīḷanaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:216_3: Alajjā aviriḷā. Tehevāti kāyaduccaritādīhi eva. Asārajjaṁ nibbhayatā. Anuttāso asambhamo.
anya-e0104n2:216_4: Vuttapaṭipakkhavasenāti alajjanākārena pāpānaṁ karaṇarasaṁ ahirikaṁ, anuttāsākārena
anya-e0104n2:216_5: anottappaṁ, vuttappakāreneva pāpato asaṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānāni attani, paresu ca agāravapadaṭṭhānāni.
anya-e0104n2:216_6: Gāmasūkarassa viya asucito kilesāsucito ajigucchanaṁ ahirikena hoti, salabhassa viya
anya-e0104n2:216_7: aggito pāpato anuttāso anottappena hotīti evaṁ vuttappaṭipakkhavasena vitthāro veditabbo.
anya-e0104n2:217_0: 479.Lubbhanti tenātiādīsu yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:217_1: Lubbhantīti abhigijjhanti. Muyhantīti na bujjhanti. Ārammaṇaggahaṇaṁ ‘‘mama ida’’nti
anya-e0104n2:217_2: taṇhābhinivesavasena abhinivissa ārammaṇassa avissajjanaṁ, na ārammaṇakaraṇamattaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:217_3: Abhisaṅgo abhimukhabhāvena āsatti. Apariccāgo avijahanaṁ, dummocanīyatā vā. Assādadassanaṁ
anya-e0104n2:217_4: assādadiṭṭhi. ‘‘Assādānupassino ca taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 2.52, 54, 57) hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:218_0: 480. Dhammasabhāvassa yāthāvato adassanaṁ cittassa andhabhāvo. Aññāṇaṁ ñāṇapaṭipakkho.
anya-e0104n2:218_1: Sampaṭivijjhituṁ asamatthatā asampaṭivedho. Yathā ñāṇaṁ ārammaṇasabhāvaṁ paṭivijjhituṁ
anya-e0104n2:218_2: na labbhati, mohassa tathā pavatti ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaṁ. Asammāpaṭipattiṁ paccupaṭṭhapeti,
anya-e0104n2:218_3: sammāpaṭipattiyā paṭipakkhabhāvena gayhatīti vā asammāpaṭipattipaccupaṭṭhāno. Yassa
anya-e0104n2:218_4: uppajjati, tassa andhakaraṇaṁ andhakāro, tathā paccupatiṭṭhatīti andhakārapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0104n2:219_0: 481.Micchāti dhammasabhāvassa viparītaṁ, niccāditoti attho. Ayoniso abhiniveso anupāyābhiniveso
anya-e0104n2:219_1: uppathābhiniveso. Dhammasabhāvaṁ atikkamitvā parato āmasanaṁ parāmāso. Viparītaggāhavasena
anya-e0104n2:220_0: 482. Yassa dhammassa vasena uddhataṁ hoti cittaṁ, taṁsampayuttadhammā vā, so dhammo
anya-e0104n2:220_2: Bhantattanti paribbhamanākāraṁ. Cetaso avūpasameti nipphādetabbe payojane bhummaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:220_3: avūpasamapaccayabhūtaṁ ārammaṇaṁ vā ‘‘avūpasamo’’ti vuttaṁ. Akusaladhammānaṁ ekantanihīnatāya
anya-e0104n2:221: 483. Thinamiddhamettha aniyataṁ, na mānādīti thinamiddhassa aniyatatā ca ettha dutiyacitte paṭhamākusalato viseso.
anya-e0104n2:222_0: Anussāhanāvasīdanabhāvena saṁhatabhāvo thinaṁ, tena yogato cittaṁ thinaṁ, tassa bhāvoti
anya-e0104n2:222_1: thinatā. Asamatthatāvighātavasena akammaññatā middhaṁ. Yasmā tato eva tena sampayuttadhammā
anya-e0104n2:222_2: medhitā vihatasāmatthiyā honti, tasmā ‘‘middhanatā middha’’nti vuttaṁ. Anussāhalakkhaṇanti
anya-e0104n2:222_3: ussāhapaṭipakkhalakkhaṇaṁ. Vīriyassa avanodanaṁ khipanaṁ vīriyāvanodanaṁ. Sampayuttadhammānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:222_4: saṁsīdanākārena paccupatiṭṭhati, tesaṁ vā saṁsīdanaṁ paccupaṭṭhapetīti saṁsīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:222_5: Akammaññatālakkhaṇanti ettha kāmaṁ thinampi akammaññasabhāvameva, taṁ pana cittassa,
anya-e0104n2:222_6: middhaṁ vedanādikkhandhattayassāti ayamettha viseso. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘tattha katamaṁ
anya-e0104n2:222_7: thinaṁ? Yā cittassa akallatā akammaññatā. Tattha katamaṁ middhaṁ? Yā kāyassa akallatā
anya-e0104n2:222_8: akammaññatā’’ti (dha. sa. 1162-1163) ca ādinā imesaṁ niddeso pavatto. Onahanaṁ viññāṇadvārānaṁ
anya-e0104n2:222_9: pidahanaṁ. Līnatā līnākāro ārammaṇaggahaṇe saṅkoco. Yasmā thinena cittasseva saṁhananaṁ
anya-e0104n2:222_10: hoti, middhena pana vedanādikkhandhattayassa viya rūpakāyassāpi, tasmā taṁ pacalāyikāniddaṁ
anya-e0104n2:222_11: paccupaṭṭhapetīti pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānaṁ vuttaṁ. Arati pantasenāsanesu, adhikusaladhammesu
anya-e0104n2:222_12: ca arocanā. Vijambhikā vijambhanasaṅkhātassa kāyaduṭṭhullassa kāraṇabhūtā saṁkilesappavatti.
anya-e0104n2:222_13: Arativijambhikādīsūti ca ādi-saddena tandiādīnaṁ gahaṇaṁ. Nipphādetabbe payojane
anya-e0104n2:223_0: Avasesā soḷasa. Māno panettha aniyato hoti, tena saddhiṁ sattaraseva honti. Paṭṭhāne
anya-e0104n2:223_1: hi ‘‘saṁyojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṁyojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā’’ti ettha
anya-e0104n2:223_2: catukkhattuṁ kāmarāgena, tikkhattuṁ paṭighena ca māno vicikicchā bhavarāgoti tayopete
anya-e0104n2:223_3: sakadāgāmino saṁyojanānaṁ saṁyojanehi dasavidhā yojanāti dassitāya dasavidhāya yojanāya
anya-e0104n2:223_7: paṭicca avijjāsaṁyojana’’nti (paṭṭhā. 3.4.1) ca evamāgatāhi yojanāhi mānassa aniyatabhāvo
anya-e0104n2:223_8: pakāsito. Yadi hi māno niyato siyā, kāmarāgassa mānarahitā pavatti na siyā, tathā
anya-e0104n2:223_9: bhavarāgassa. Evaṁ sati paṭṭhāne catukkhattuṁ kāmarāgena yojanā na siyā, tikkhattuṁyeva
anya-e0104n2:223_10: siyā. Bhavarāgamūlikā ca na siyā. Evañca saṁyojanānaṁ saṁyojanehi aṭṭhavidhena yojanā
anya-e0104n2:223_11: siyā, na dasavidhena. Dasavidhāva ca dassitāti. Seyyādivasena uccato namanaṁ unnati.
anya-e0104n2:223_12: Unnamanavaseneva saṁpaggaharaso. Na vīriyaṁ viya taṁtaṁkiccasādhane abbhussahanavasena.
anya-e0104n2:223_13: Omānassāpi attānaṁ avaṁ katvā gahaṇampi sampaggahaṇavasenevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Ketu vuccati
anya-e0104n2:223_14: accuggatadhajo, idha pana ketu viyāti ketu, uḷāratamādibhāvo. Taṁ ketubhāvasaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0104n2:223_15: ketuṁ kāmetīti ketukamyaṁ, cittaṁ. Yassa dhammassa vasena ketukamyaṁ, sā ketukamyatā.
anya-e0104n2:223_16: ‘‘Aha’’nti pavattanato mānassa diṭṭhisadisī pavattīti so diṭṭhiyā saddhiṁ ekacittuppāde
anya-e0104n2:225_1: ca visappanaraso. Kāyassa vijjhattabhāvāpādanato attano nissayadahanaraso. Dussanaṁ
anya-e0104n2:225_2: attano, parassa ca upabhogaphalakālesu aniṭṭhattā visasaṁsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṁ viya daṭṭhabboti
anya-e0104n2:226_0: 486. Yaṁ parasampattīsu issākaraṇaṁ, sā issāti dassento āha ‘‘issāyanā issā’’ti .
anya-e0104n2:226_1: Usūyanaṁ asahanaṁ. Tatthevāti parasampattīsu eva. Abhiratipaṭipakkhabhūtaṁ issāya
